1.verse: Jesus Promise Fo Send Godʼs Spirit - Aloha, Teofilus! I wen write one nodda book fo you befo, an I tell you all da stuff dat Jesus wen do an teach from da start,

2.verse: till da time God take him up inside da sky. Befo he go up, he tell da guys dat he wen pick fo send all ova, wat dey gotta do. Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen tell him all dat.

3.verse: Now, afta Jesus wen suffa, he let da guys dat he wen pick see him, an he prove dat he stay alive fo real. He stay show up by dem fo forty days, an wen tell dem how everyting stay wen God stay King.

4.verse: One time wen Jesus wen stay wit his guys, he tell dem, “No go way from Jerusalem, but wait ova hea till you guys get da Spirit my Fadda wen promise fo send. You guys wen hear me tell bout dat Spirit.

5.verse: Befo time, John Da Baptiza Guy wen baptize peopo wit water, but pretty soon God goin baptize you guys diffren kine: he goin let his Spesho Spirit take charge a you.”

6.verse: Jesus Go Up Inside Da Sky - One time, da guys dat Jesus wen pick wen come togedda wit him, an dey aks him, “Boss, you goin come King now fo da Israel peopo, jalike had king befo time?”

7.verse: He tell dem, “Not yoa kuleana fo know da time o da day da Fadda wen pick. He da One goin do dat.

8.verse: But you guys goin get spesho kine power wen Godʼs Spesho Spirit take charge a you. An den you guys goin tell da peopo in Jerusalem wat you know bout me, an da peopo all ova Judea, Samaria, an all ova da world.”

9.verse: Afta he wen say dat, God wen take him up in front dem, an den one cloud wen move unda him, so dey no can see him no moa.

10.verse: Dey still stay looking in da sky real good wen he stay going, an right den an dea two guys wit white clotheses wen stand by dem.

11.verse: Dey say, “You guys from Galilee, how come you stay standing hea an stay looking in da sky? Dis guy Jesus, God wen take him from you, up inside da sky. He goin come back da same way you wen see him go.”

12.verse: Dey Pick One Guy Fo Take Judas Place - Den da guys Jesus wen pick wen go way from Olive Ridge, an go back Jerusalem, bout half mile.

13.verse: Wen dey wen come, dey all go da place upstairs wea dey was staying. Had Peter, John, James, an Andrew; Philip an Thomas; Bartolomew an Matthew; Alfeus boy James, Simon da Jewish Sovereignty guy, an James boy Judas.

14.verse: Plenny times dey all pray togedda, wit da wahines, an Jesus mudda Mary, an his bruddas.

15.verse: Dat time had like hundred twenty peopo dat trus Jesus. Dey wen come togedda, an Peter wen stand up fo talk.

16.verse: He say, “Bruddas an sistas, da Bible come true awready, an dass how gotta be. King David wen tell long time ago bout da guy Judas, cuz Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen tell David all dat. Judas, he da guy wen bring da guys dat bus Jesus, an wen show dem who him.

17.verse: But Judas, he wen come from us guys an he wen work wit us.”

18.verse: (Now, da guys dat like kill Jesus wen give Judas money fo da bad ting he goin do, an he wen go buy one field. But he wen fall down dea, an he bus open, an his guts all come out.

19.verse: An everybody inside Jerusalem hear bout dat, so dey wen name da field “Akeldama,” dat mean “Blood Field.”)

20.verse: An den Peter say, “David wen write down inside da Songs Fo God, ‘His place goin stay empty, No let nobody stay dea.’ An David wen write too, ‘Let one nodda guy take his kuleana.’

21.verse: “So, we gotta pick one guy dat wen stay wit us da whole time Jesus da Boss wen come an den go from us,

22.verse: from da time John wen baptize him, till he go up to da sky. One a da guys gotta go wit us fo tell how Jesus wen come back alive again.”

23.verse: So, dey pick two guys: Joseph, da guy dey name Barsabbas o Justus, an Mattias.

24.verse: Den dey aks God fo help dem, an say, “Boss, you know how everybody stay inside. Show us da guy you wen pick from da two guys,

25.verse: so he can work fo you an tell bout you, cuz Judas no stay. Judas wen go da place dass fo him.”

26.verse: Den dey wen make jalike Jun Ken A Po kine, an Mattias wen win, so he wen come togedda wit da eleven guys dat Jesus wen send all ova.

1.verse: Godʼs Spesho Spirit Come - Wen da Day Numba Fifty afta Passova wen come, da one dey name Pentecost, all da peopo dat trus Jesus wen stay togedda in one place.

2.verse: Right den an dea one noise wen come down from da sky jalike one strong wind, an make big noise all ova da house wea dey stay sitting.

3.verse: Den dey see wat look jalike small kine fire dat wen stay right ova every guy.

4.verse: Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a dem, an dey wen start fo talk wit plenny odda kine languages, cuz Godʼs Spirit wen make um so dey can.

5.verse: Had Jewish peopo dat had plenny respeck fo God from all da countries in da world, staying inside Jerusalem dat time.

6.verse: Wen dey hear dat noise, plenny peopo come togedda, an dey was all shock, cuz every guy wen hear dem telling stuff in his own kine talk.

7.verse: Wen blow dea minds, an make dem tink plenny. An dey wen tell, “Eh! Da guys dat stay talking, dey from Galilee, yeah?

8.verse: Den how come us guys stay hear dem telling stuff wit our own kine talk?

9.verse: We come from all ova da place -- from Partia, Medea, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Cappadocia, Pontus, Asia,

10.verse: Frygia, Pamfylia, Egypt, Libya near Cyrene, an some guys from Rome.

11.verse: Get Jews, an guys dat wen trus God an come jalike one Jew. Get peopo from Crete an Arabia. An still yet, we all hear dem telling da awesome stuff God do, wit our own kine talk!”

12.verse: Wen blow dea minds, an dey no can figga, an dey wen tell each odda, “Eh, wat dis mean?”

13.verse: But had odda guys dat wen make fun a dem an say, “Eh, dese guys, dey drunk!”

14.verse: Peter Teach All Da Peopo - Den Peter wen stand up wit da odda eleven guys, an wen tell da peopo wit one big voice, “My bruddas an sistas, all you Jewish peopo dat stay inside Jerusalem, listen! I like tell you guys wat mean dis stuff dass happening.

15.verse: Dese guys, dey not drunk jalike you tinking. Ony stay nine clock in da morning.

16.verse: Dis wat Joel wen tell, da guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago,

17.verse: God wen say, ‘Dis wat I goin do in da last days, I goin make my Spirit take charge a all da peopo. Yoa boys an yoa girls goin talk fo me. Yoa young guys goin see spesho tings. An yoa old guys goin dream plenny dreams.

18.verse: Yeah, an dat time too, I goin make my Spirit Take charge a da peopo dat work fo me, Guys an wahines, An dey goin talk fo me.

19.verse: I goin show awesome stuff up dea in da sky, An down hea on top da earth Goin get blood an fire an big kine smoke clouds.

20.verse: Da sun goin come dark, An da moon goin come red jalike blood. Dat goin happen Befo da big an awesome Day Wen God da Boss come fo judge all da peopo.

21.verse: An den, everybody dat know who da Boss fo real kine An tell him fo take um outa da bad kine stuff dey do, Da Boss goin listen an take um outa all dat.’

22.verse: “Eh, you guys from Israel ohana, listen! I like tell you bout Jesus, da guy from Nazaret town. God wen show dat Jesus fo real, cuz God wen give him power, an he wen do all kine awesome stuff dat show who him. An you guys know dis fo real, cuz he wen do um ova hea by you guys.

23.verse: God wen plan um long time ago, cuz he wen know dey goin give Jesus ova to you guys. An you guys wen take him an let da bad kine guys kill him on top one cross.

24.verse: But God wen make him come back alive again from mahke. He no need suffa an mahke again, cuz a wat God wen do. He no can stay mahke, cuz he mo strong.

25.verse: David wen say dis bout him: ‘I wen spock da Boss. He stay in front me all da time. He stay close by my right side. I no goin come shook up.

26.verse: So I stay real good inside, Wen I tell peopo bout him. No matta I goin mahke, I know I can rest an wait fo God,

27.verse: Cuz God, you no goin let me stay inside da Mahke Peopoʼs Place, An you no goin let me rot, cuz I stay good an spesho fo you.

28.verse: You wen teach me how fo do, So I can live fo real kine. You goin make me stay real good inside, Cuz you stay wit me.’

29.verse: “Bruddas an sistas, good I tell you guys fo real kine dat da leada fo our ohana, David, he wen mahke, an dey wen bury him, an his grave stay hea still yet.

30.verse: David was one guy dat wen talk fo God, an wen know dat God wen promise dis: ‘Bumbye I goin make one from yoa ohana king jalike you.’

31.verse: David wen know wat God goin do. He wen say dat da Spesho Guy God Send goin come back alive again. He no goin stay inside da Mahke Peopoʼs Place, an he no goin rot.

32.verse: God wen make Jesus come alive again, an we all wen see him an tell bout him.

33.verse: God wen put him in da mos importan place by his right side, an he wen get Godʼs Spesho Spirit, da One God wen promise. He wen make his Spirit take charge a us guys too, an dass wat you see an hear now.

34.verse: Cuz David neva go up in da sky, but he wen say, ‘Da Boss wen tell my Boss: “Come ova hea, sit down! Dis da importan place by my right side.

35.verse: Bumbye I goin make da peopo dat go agains you Go down in front you, Fo show dat you da winna ova dem.” ’

36.verse: “So, listen! All da Israel peopo gotta know dis fo shua: You guys wen kill dis guy Jesus on top one cross, but God wen make him da Boss, an he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.”

37.verse: Wen da peopo hear dat, dea heart come sore, an dey tell Peter an da odda guys Jesus wen send all ova, “Bruddas, wat we goin do?”

38.verse: Peter tell dem, “Every one a you guys gotta come sorry an stop doing all da bad kine stuff you stay do, an get baptize fo show you Jesus guys. He da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. Den he goin let you guys go, an hemo yoa shame fo all dat bad kine stuff, an he goin give you his Spesho Spirit.

39.verse: He wen promise all dat fo you guys an yoa kids, an fo all da peopo dat no stay tight wit God -- all da ones da Boss our God goin tell fo come to him.”

40.verse: Peter wen tell dem plenny mo stuff, an beg um, “Let God take you outa da bad kine stuff dat da odda peopo stay doing now.”

41.verse: Had bout three tousand peopo dat wen trus wat he wen say, an wen get baptize. Den dey come togedda wit da odda peopo dat wen trus Jesus.

42.verse: Dey wen stick wit all da stuff da guys dat Jesus wen send wen teach dem. An dey all wen stay togedda, an eat togedda, an wen pray.

43.verse: Da Peopo Dat Trus Jesus Stay Togedda - Da guys Jesus wen send all ova, dey get power fo do plenny awesome stuff. Everybody stay scared, cuz dey get plenny respeck fo Jesus guys.

44.verse: All da peopo dat wen trus Jesus wen stay togedda, an wen share all dea stuffs wit each odda.

45.verse: Dey sell dea stuffs, an give da money to all da peopo dat need kokua.

46.verse: Every day dey come togedda inside da temple yard. Dey broke da bread inside dea houses, an eat togedda da food. An dea heart wen stay good inside, an dey neva put on one ack.

47.verse: Dey wen tank God an tell how good he stay. An all da peopo wen talk good bout dem. An every day da Boss wen bring odda peopo dat he wen take outa da bad kine stuff dey wen do.

1.verse: One Guy Dat No Can Walk Come Good - One time Peter an John wen go to da temple three clock. Dat was da time fo pray.

2.verse: Had one guy ova dea dat no can walk from da time he was born. Some guys carry him by da temple gate every day. Dat gate, dey wen name um “Beautiful.” Dey put him dea so he can beg fo money from da peopo dat go inside da temple yard.

3.verse: Wen he wen spock Peter an John going inside, he wen beg fo someting from dem.

4.verse: Peter an John wen look him in da eye, an Peter say, “Look at us!”

5.verse: So da guy wen look, tinking he goin get someting.

6.verse: Peter tell um, “I no mo money, but wat I get, I give you. Jesus from Nazaret, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, I his guy. Dass why I tell you, stand up an walk!”

7.verse: Peter wen take his right hand an help him stand up. Right den an dea da guyʼs feet an ankles wen come strong.

8.verse: He jump up on his feet an walk all ova da place. Den he wen go wit dem inside da temple yard. He walking, an jumping, an tanking God.

9.verse: All da peopo see him walking an tanking God.

10.verse: Dey know he da begga guy dat wen sit by da temple gate name “Beautiful.” Dey wen tink plenny, an dea jaws wen drop cuz a wat wen happen to him.

11.verse: Peter Teach Inside Da Temple Yard - Da guy wen stay by Peter an John. All da peopo, wen blow dea minds, an dey wen run togedda by Peter guys inside da place name “Solomonʼs Lanai.”

12.verse: Peter wen see da peopo, an he tell dem, “You Israel peopo, how come you guys all shock cuz a dis? How come you guys looking at us guys an tinking dat we wen make him walk wit our own power, o cuz we stay tight wit God?

13.verse: Da same God fo Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob, he da same God fo our ancesta guys. He da One wen make da guy good. He da One wen make Jesus, his helpa, come awesome. You guys wen give ova Jesus so dey can kill him. Pilate wen like let him go, but den you guys wen tell Pilate dat Jesus not Godʼs Spesho Guy.

14.verse: You guys wen give ova to Pilate da Spesho An Good Guy from God dat everytime do da right ting, an den you say you like Pilate fo hand ova one killa guy to you guys.

15.verse: An so you guys wen kill Jesus, da One dat make everyting alive fo real kine. But God, he wen bring Jesus back alive. An us guys wen see all dis happen.

16.verse: Dis guy you see hea, you guys know him. He wen find out wat kine guy Jesus, an he go trus him. Dass why he come good. Jesus, he da One dat wen make him come good all da way. An you guys can see dat he stay good.

17.verse: “My bruddas, I know dat wat you guys an yoa leadas wen do to Jesus, you neva undastan wat you doing.

18.verse: Da guys dat wen talk fo God long time ago wen tell inside da Bible dat da Spesho Guy God Goin Send gotta suffa. An dass how dat wen come true.

19.verse: “So den, you guys gotta come sorry an stop doing all da bad kine stuff you do, an stick wit God, an den he goin take away yoa shame fo all da bad kine stuff you guys wen do.

20.verse: An da Boss goin make you guys rest inside an make you guys strong inside yoa hearts. He goin send his Spesho Guy Jesus, da One he wen pick fo help you guys.

21.verse: Jesus gotta stay inside da sky till da time come wen God goin make everyting new. Jalike da spesho guys dat wen talk fo God long time ago wen tell, dat God wen promise fo do dat.

22.verse: Moses wen tell, you know, ‘God yoa Boss, he goin give you guys one Guy goin be jalike me, dat goin talk fo God. He goin come from da Jewish peopo. You guys gotta listen an do everyting he tell you.’

23.verse: Moses wen say dis too: ‘Anybody dat no like listen to dat Guy dat talk fo God, God goin wipe dem out from dea peopo.’ ”

24.verse: Den Peter say, “Befo time, Samuel an all da odda guys dat wen talk fo God afta him, dey all wen tell bout wat stay happen now.

25.verse: You guys da one wen get wat dey wen talk bout. Dass fo you guys, da deal God wen make wit yoa ancesta guys long time ago. God wen tell Abraham, ‘All da diffren peopos all ova da world, bumbye wen dey tink bout da peopos dat come from you, dey goin say, “We like God make everyting come good fo us guys, cuz we stay tight wit da Abraham ohana!” ’

26.verse: God wen pick his Spesho Helpa Jesus, an send him by you guys first. He send him so he can do good kine stuff fo you guys, an make you guys so you no do da bad kine stuff no moa.”

1.verse: Peter An John Go In Front Da Main Leadas - Peter an John was still yet talking wit da peopo, wen da priest guys, da captain fo da security guards fo da temple, an da Sadducee guys wen come by dem.

2.verse: Dey stay real huhu cuz da guys wen teach da peopo, an wen tell dem dat cuz Jesus wen come back alive from mahke, dat show, dat da mahke guys goin come back alive again.

3.verse: So dey wen bus Peter an John. Da sun jus wen go down, so dey wen put dem in jail till da nex day.

4.verse: But plenny peopo dat wen hear dem wen trus wat dey wen say. Had bout five tousand guys dat wen trus Jesus.

5.verse: Da nex day da main leadas, da older leadas, an da teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules wen come togedda inside Jerusalem.

6.verse: Annas, da Head Priest guy, wen come, an Kaiafas, John, Alexander, an da odda guys from da Head Priest ohana.

7.verse: Dey wen tell some guys fo bring Peter an John in front dem, an dey wen aks dem, “Eh, wat kine power you guys get fo do all dis stuff? Wat name you wen use?”

8.verse: Den Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a Peter. He wen tell dem, “You leada guys, an da older leada guys fo da peopo,

9.verse: you guys wen bring us hea dis day. Was cuz we wen help one guy dat no can walk, o wat? You guys like know how he wen come good?

10.verse: Kay den. You guys an all da odda peopo from Israel, good you know dis: Jesus from Nazaret, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, we his guys. You guys wen kill him on top one cross, but God wen make him come back alive again. Dass why dis guy wen come good, cuz he stay tight wit Jesus. An now dis guy can stand hea in front you guys.

11.verse: Jesus, he da One da Bible talk bout: ‘Da stone da builda guys neva like use, cuz dey tink was junk, Dat wen come da corner block fo da house.’

12.verse: No mo odda guy dat can take da peopo outa da bad kine stuff dey doing. Neva have nobody in da whole world dat we gotta stick wit fo take us outa da bad kine stuff we doing. God ony wen give us Jesus fo do dat.”

13.verse: Da leadas wen see dat Peter an John wen talk wit power an dey not scared. An da leadas wen know dat Peter an John jus regula guys dat neva go school fo learn, an dat wen blow dea minds. An dey know dat dis guys, dey wen stay wit Jesus.

14.verse: But da leadas can see da guy dat Peter dem wen make come good, stay standing dea wit dem, so dey no can say notting.

15.verse: So da leada guys tell Peter an John fo go outside, an da leada guys wen talk togedda.

16.verse: Dey say, “Wat we goin do wit dem? Everybody dat stay inside Jerusalem know dat dey wen do one awesome ting dat show wat kine dem. An us guys no can say dass not true.

17.verse: We gotta tell dese guys, ‘You guys betta not talk bout dis guy Jesus to nobody no moa! No use his name fo do stuff!’ No good all da odda peopo all ova da place hear bout dis ting!”

18.verse: Den da leada guys wen tell Peter an John fo come inside one mo time. An dey tell dem, “No talk o teach nobody bout da guy Jesus no moa, an no use his name fo do stuff!”

19.verse: But Peter an John wen say, “You guys figga fo yoaself wat God tink: Mo betta fo do wat you guys say, o fo do wat God say?

20.verse: Cuz us guys, we no can stop talking bout da stuff we wen see an hear.”

21.verse: So dey tell um one mo time dey betta not talk bout Jesus no moa, an den dey wen let um go. Dey no can figga how fo punish dem, cuz all da peopo wen stay telling dat God awesome, cuz a everyting dat happen.

22.verse: Cuz da guy dey wen make come good in dis awesome way, he stay mo den forty years old awready.

23.verse: Da Guys Dat Trus God Pray Fo Talk An No Come Scared Wen Dey Talk - Afta da leada guys let Peter an John go, dey go home by dea own peopo, an tell dem everyting da main priest guys an da older leada guys wen say to dem.

24.verse: Wen dea own peopo wen hear dat, dey wen pray togedda lidis: “Boss, you da King. You wen make da sky, da earth, an da sea, an everyting dat stay inside dem.

25.verse: Yoa Spesho Spirit wen talk fo you wen yoa worka guy, our ancesta David, wen say, ‘How come da diffren peopos dat no trus God come huhu an wild? How come da peopos tinking fo do stuff dat no good fo notting?

26.verse: Da kings from all ova da earth stand up, An dea leadas come togedda fo fight agains da Boss An da Spesho Guy He Wen Send.’

27.verse: “An dass wat wen happen! Had King Herod an da governa Pontius Pilate, an da peopo dat not Jews, an da Israel peopo. Dey all wen come togedda inside dis town fo plan how dey can kill Jesus. He yoa Good An Spesho Worka Guy, da One You Wen Send.

28.verse: Dey do wat you wen know long time befo gotta happen. An you wen let dem do um.

29.verse: Now, Boss, listen wat dey say agains us, an give us da kine power wen we talk fo no come scared.

30.verse: We like you make da sick guys come good an show awesome tings wit yoa power wen us guys use yoa name, cuz a wat yoa Good An Spesho Worka Guy Jesus wen do.”

31.verse: Wen dey pau pray, da place wea dey stay togedda wen shake. An Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a all dem. An dey wen tell da tings God say wit power, an dey neva come scared.

32.verse: Da Peopo Dat Trus God Give Dea Stuffs To Each Odda - All da peopo dat wen trus God wen come jalike one inside dea hearts an come jalike one how dey tink. Nobody say dat his stuffs stay his own, but dey stay share everyting dey get wit each odda.

33.verse: Da guys Jesus wen send all ova, dey stay telling dat Jesus wen come back alive. Dey talk wit plenny power, an da way dem guys stay, can see dat God stay do choke plenny good stuff fo all dem.

34.verse: Neva have nobody wit dem dat wen need anyting. Eh, even da peopo dat wen own land o houses wen sell um,

35.verse: an give da money to da guys Jesus wen send all ova. An den dey give da money to da peopo dat need um, litto bit o plenny.

36.verse: Had one guy name Joseph, from da Levi ohana. He from Cyprus Island. Da guys Jesus wen send wen give um da nickname Barnabas, cuz dat mean “Da guy dat give us good kine words.”

37.verse: He wen sell one field he wen own, an den give da money to da guys Jesus wen send.

1.verse: Ananias An Safira - Had one guy, his name Ananias, an his wife name Safira. Dey wen sell one land dey own.

2.verse: He wen keep some a da money fo himself, an den he wen bring da rest a da money an give um to da guys Jesus wen send. An his wife wen know bout all dat.

3.verse: Peter wen tell him, “Ananias, how come you let da Devil take charge you, an you bulai to Godʼs Spesho Spirit? Cuz you wen keep fo yoaself some a da money you wen get fo da land.

4.verse: Befo you wen sell um, dat land stay yoas. An afta you wen sell um, you get da right fo do wat you like wit da money. How come you wen tink fo bulai bout da money? You no stay bulai to da peopo, but to God.”

5.verse: Wen Ananias hear dat, he fall down an mahke. An everybody dat wen hear bout um wen come real scared.

6.verse: Den da young guys wen come an wrap up his body, an take um outside, an bury um.

7.verse: Bout three hours lata his wife wen come. She neva know wat wen happen.

8.verse: Peter wen say, “Dis how much you an yoa husban wen get fo yoa land?” She wen say, “Yeah, yeah, dass how much.”

9.verse: Peter wen tell her, “How come you an yoa husban wen tink togedda fo find out if da Bossʼs Spirit goin let you guys get away wit bulai? Look! Da guys dat wen bury yoa husban, dey stay coming, an dey goin carry you ova dea too.”

10.verse: Right den an dea she wen fall down by his feet an mahke. An da young guys wen come inside, an see her dea mahke, an dey carry her outside, an bury her by her husban.

11.verse: An all da peopo dat come togedda fo church, an everybody dat hear bout wat wen happen, dey all come real scared.

12.verse: Jesus Guys Do Awesome Stuff - Da guys Jesus send wen do plenny awesome stuff da show who dem in front da peopo. All da peopo dat trus God wen come togedda inside Solomonʼs Lanai.

13.verse: All da odda peopo stay scared fo come togedda wit Jesus guys ova dea, but still yet da peopo wen tink Jesus guys good guys.

14.verse: Den plenny mo guys an wahines wen trus da Boss, an come togedda wit dem.

15.verse: Cuz a dat da peopo wen bring da sick peopo on da streets, an lay dem on top da beds an da mats, so dat wen Peter goin come, his shadow goin pass ova dem wen he go by, an da sick peopo can come good.

16.verse: Plenny peopo wen come from da towns aroun Jerusalem. An dey wen bring dea sick peopo an da oddas dat get bad kine spirits dat make dem suffa plenny. An Jesus guys wen make dem all come good.

17.verse: Da Guys Jesus Wen Send Suffa Plenny - Den da Head Priest an all his guys dat come from da Sadducee guys, dey wen come jealous.

18.verse: Dey wen bus da guys Jesus wen send all ova, an put dem in jail.

19.verse: But nite time one angel messenja guy from da Boss wen open da jail door, an bring dem outside.

20.verse: He wen say, “Go stand in front all da peopo inside da temple yard, an tell um everyting bout dis new kine life.”

21.verse: Wen da sun stay come up, dey wen go inside da temple yard jalike da angel guy wen say, an dey wen start fo teach da peopo. Now, da Head Priest guy an his guys wen tell all da main leadas, an all da odda leadas fo da Israel peopo, fo come togedda. An dey wen send guys to da jail fo bring Jesus guys to dem.

22.verse: But wen da police guys wen come to da jail, dey neva find Jesus guys ova dea. So da police guys wen go back an tell da leadas,

23.verse: “We wen find da jail door still yet stay lock, an da security guard standing by da doors, but wen we wen open um, nobody stay inside.”

24.verse: Wen da leada guys hear dat, da captain fo da temple guard an da main priest guys wen come mix up, an dey wen tink plenny wat goin happen.

25.verse: Den one guy wen come an tell dem, “You know wat? Da guys you wen put in jail, dey stay standing inside da temple yard, teaching da peopo!”

26.verse: Wen da captain hear dat, he an his guys wen go an bring Jesus guys to da main leadas. Da captain an his guys neva force Jesus guys, cuz dey scared dat da peopo goin throw stones at da captain an his guys.

27.verse: Dey wen bring in da guys Jesus wen send an wen make dem stand in front da main leadas, so da Head Priest guy can aks dem stuff.

28.verse: Da Head Priest say, “Listen! We wen tell you guys you betta not teach da peopo bout da guy Jesus, an use his name fo do stuff. But you guys still yet teach dis kine stuff all ova Jerusalem. An you even like blame us fo kill him!”

29.verse: Peter an Jesus odda guys wen say, “We gotta do wat God say, an not do wat peopo say!

30.verse: Da God fo our ancesta guys, he da One wen make Jesus come back alive again, afta you guys wen kill him on top one cross.

31.verse: God wen take him up wit him, an wen make him sit da importan place by his right side, cuz he da Main Leada, an he da One dat can take us outa da bad kine stuff we do. He da One can help da Israel peopo come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an let um go an hemo dea shame.

32.verse: We wen see all dis stuff happen, an Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen see um too. God give his Spesho Spirit to da peopo dat listen to him.”

33.verse: Wen da leada guys wen hea dat, dey come real huhu, an wen like kill Jesus guys.

34.verse: But one guy name Gamaliel wen stand up in front da main leadas fo talk. He one Pharisee guy dat teach Godʼs Rules, an all da peopo had plenny respeck fo him. He wen tell dem fo take da guys outside.

35.verse: Den he say, “Eh! Brudda Israel guys, we betta tink real good bout wat we goin do to dese guys.

36.verse: Cuz rememba, one time had one guy name Teudas. He wen talk big bout himself, an had bout four hundred guys wen stick wit him. But den some guys wen kill him, an all his guys wen run away, an da whole ting wen pau.

37.verse: Latas, wen da leadas make da peopo sign up, had one guy name Judas from Galilee dat wen show up. He lead some guys away, an dey wen make big beef. But dey wen kill him too, an all his guys wen run away.

38.verse: So, fo dese guys, I tell you wat fo do. Leave um alone! Let um go! Cuz if wat dey do ony come from peopo, goin pau.

39.verse: But if da ting come from God, you no can stop um. You ony goin make one big beef agains God.”

40.verse: Da leada guys wen like wat Gamaliel say. Dey wen tell Jesus guys fo come inside, an wen tell da police guys fo bus um up good. Den dey wen tell Jesus guys one mo time dey betta not talk bout da guy Jesus no moa, o use his name fo do stuff. An dey wen let dem go.

41.verse: Jesus guys wen go way from da main leadas. An dey wen stay real good inside cuz God figga dey stay good nuff fo suffa shame cuz dey Jesus guys.

42.verse: Every day dey neva pau teach an tell everybody inside da temple yard an inside all da houses da Good Stuff bout how Jesus, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

1.verse: Da Seven Helpa Guys - Dat time had mo an mo peopo dat wen trus Jesus an stick wit his guys. But some a da Jewish peopo dat talk Greek dat wen trus Jesus wen squawk agains da peopo dat talk da local language, cuz every day da local peopo neva help da widows dat talk Greek get some food. Dey ony help da widows dat talk da local language.

2.verse: So da Twelve guys wen tell all da peopo dat trus Jesus fo come togedda, an dey say, “Dass not right fo us fo pau teach wat God say, jus so we can give food to da peopo dat need um.

3.verse: So den, you bruddas pick seven guys from all you guys. Make shua dat everybody know dese guys get Godʼs Spesho Spirit in charge a dem, an dey akamai. An we goin give dem dis kuleana.

4.verse: An den us twelve guys can pray an teach wat God say all da time.”

5.verse: Everybody dea like wat Jesus guys wen say. So dey pick Stephen, one guy dat really trus God an get Godʼs Spesho Spirit in charge a him, an Philip, Prokorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, an Nicolas from Antiok, da one dat no was Jewish but wen come jalike one Jew.

6.verse: Dey wen bring dese guys by da twelve guys Jesus wen send. An da twelve guys wen aks God fo help dem, an dey put dea hands on top dem.

7.verse: Jesus guys wen go aroun an tell da peopo wat God wen say. So had mo an mo peopo inside Jerusalem dat wen trus God an stick wit Jesus guys. An plenny priest guys wen trus da Good Stuff From God an do wat God say.

8.verse: Dey Bus Stephen - Stephen, he one guy dat God do plenny good tings fo, an he get plenny power from God. He wen do plenny awesome stuffs dat show wat kine guy him, an da peopo see dat he get power.

9.verse: Had some churches fo da Jewish religion fo da peopo dat wen come dea from Cyrene, Alexandria, Cilicia, an Asia. Dem Jewish churches stay fo da peopo dat was slaves befo time, but now dey not slaves no moa. Had guys from dose Jewish churches wen start fo make argue wit Stephen.

10.verse: But Stephen real akamai, an Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen tell him wat fo say. An da Jewish guys no can say notting.

11.verse: So da Jewish guys wen bring odda guys fo say, “Eh! We wen hear dis guy Stephen talk stink bout Moses an bout God!”

12.verse: Dass how dey wen make da peopo, da older leadas, an da guys dat teach Godʼs Rules come all work up wit Stephen. Dey wen grab him an bring him in front da main leada guys.

13.verse: Den dey bring odda guys dat wen bulai bout him an say, “Dis guy still yet no like pau talk stink bout da temple dat stay spesho fo God, an bout Godʼs Rules.

14.verse: We wen hear him say dat da guy Jesus from Nazaret goin broke down da temple an goin change all da stuff Moses wen tell us fo do!”

15.verse: All da guys dat wen stay sitting dea an da main leada guys wen look at Stephen real good, an dey wen see dat his face wen stay look jalike one angel guyʼs face.

1.verse: Stephen Wen Talk - Da Head Priest guy wen tell Stephen, “Dass true, o wat?”

2.verse: Stephen say, “My bruddas an my faddas, try listen to me! Da awesome God wen come by our ancesta Abraham wen he stay Mesopotamia side, befo he wen go Haran side.

3.verse: God wen tell him, ‘Go way from yoa place an yoa ohana, an go da place I goin show you.’

4.verse: So Abraham wen go way from da place da Chaldea peopo live an stay in Haran. Afta Abraham fadda wen mahke, God wen send Abraham to dis place wea you guys stay now.

5.verse: God neva give Abraham dis place fo his own home. He neva get even one litto bit land ova hea. But God wen promise him dat his ohana goin own dis land bumbye; no matta Abraham neva have kids dat time.

6.verse: God wen tell him, ‘Yoa ohana goin stay one place far away, dat not deaʼs. Da peopo ova dea goin make dem slaves, an dey goin suffa fo four hundred years.

7.verse: I goin punish da peopo dat make dem slaves. An latas, yoa ohana guys goin go way from ova dea, an dey goin pray an show me respeck in dis place.’ Dass wat God wen say.

8.verse: Den God wen make one deal wit Abraham, dat dey goin cut skin dea guys fo show dat dey Godʼs peopo. Den Abraham wen get Isaac his boy, an he wen cut skin him day numba eight afta he wen born. Latas, Isaac wen get Jacob fo his boy, an Jacob wen get twelve boys. Dem twelve guys wen come da main faddas an leadas fo da twelve ohanas fo da Israel peopo.

9.verse: “Da bruddas wen come jealous cuz a dea brudda Joseph, an dey wen sell him fo come one slave in Egypt side. But God wen stay wit him.

10.verse: God wen take him outa all da trouble he stay in. He wen make him akamai, an wen help him. Da king fo Egypt, da one name Pharaoh, he wen tink Joseph one good guy. So Pharaoh wen make him da leada fo da Egypt land an all his palace.

11.verse: Den one big hard time wen come all ova Egypt an Canaan, an everybody wen suffa plenny. So our ancesta guys no can find food fo eat.

12.verse: Wen our ancesta Jacob wen hear dat had wheat Egypt side, he wen send his boys ova dea first time.

13.verse: Da nex time dey wen go, da guy Joseph tell his bruddas who him, an den Pharaoh wen hear bout Josephʼs ohana.

14.verse: Afta dat, Joseph wen send guys fo bring his fadda Jacob an all his ohana Egypt side. Had seventy-five peopo wen come.

15.verse: Dass how Jacob wen go Egypt side. Bumbye he wen mahke, an our ancesta guys, dey wen mahke too.

16.verse: Our peopo wen bring back dea bodies to Shekem, an wen put um inside da tombs dat Abraham wen buy from Hamorʼs boys befo time.

17.verse: “Wen da time wen stay near fo God fo do all da stuff he wen promise our ancesta Abraham, our ohana in Egypt side wen come mo big.

18.verse: Den one odda king wen come Pharaoh in Egypt dat neva know who Joseph.

19.verse: He wen bulai our peopo an make our ancesta guys suffa plenny. He wen make dem throw out dea babies dat jus wen born, so dey no goin stay live.

20.verse: Dat time Moses wen born. Everybody tink he look real nice. Three months dey wen hide Moses an take care him inside his faddaʼs house.

21.verse: Wen dey no can hide him no moa, dey wen put him outside, an Pharaohʼs girl wen find him an wen take care him jalike he her own boy.

22.verse: Dey wen teach Moses plenny so he wen know all da stuff da smart guys in Egypt wen know. An he wen talk an make jalike one guy dat get power.

23.verse: “Wen Moses wen come forty years old, he wen like go by his bruddas an sistas, da Israel peopo.

24.verse: He wen spock one Egypt guy dat wen bus up one Israel guy, so he wen go help da Israel guy. He wen kill da Egypt guy, fo pay him back.

25.verse: He wen tink his own peopo goin know dat God wen use him fo take dem outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in, but dey neva know dat.

26.verse: Da nex day Moses wen come by two Israel guys dat stay beefing. He wen try fo make um come friends. He wen say, ‘Eh, you guys bruddas. How come you hurting each odda?’

27.verse: But da guy dat stay bussing up da odda guy wen push Moses away an wen say, ‘Eh, who you tink you? Who wen make you da leada guy an da judge fo us?

28.verse: You like kill me jalike you wen kill da Egypt guy yesterday?’

29.verse: Wen Moses wen hear dat, he wen beat it outa dea an go Midian side. An he wen stay ova dea long time, but he not from dea. An he wen marry an get two boys.

30.verse: “Afta forty years, one angel guy wen come by Moses inside one bush dat stay burning in da boonies near da mountain name Sinai.

31.verse: Wen Moses wen see dat, wen blow his mind. He wen go near ova dea fo check um out, an he wen hear da Boss say,

32.verse: ‘I yoa ancestas God; I Abrahamʼs God, an Isaacʼs God, an Jacobʼs God.’ Eh, da guy Moses wen come so scared he wen shake all ova, an he neva like look.

33.verse: Da Boss wen tell him, ‘Take off yoa slippas, cuz da place wea you stay standing, dat one place dat stay spesho fo me.

34.verse: Fo shua I wen see how da Egypt peopo stay make my peopo suffa plenny. I wen hear dem moaning, an I stay come fo let dem go. Come, I goin send you back Egypt side.’ ”

35.verse: Den Stephen wen tell dem, “Moses, he da guy dat da Israel peopo wen throw out. Dey wen say, ‘Eh, who make you da leada guy an da judge fo us guys?’ But Moses da one God wen send fo come dea leada an da one dat wen cut um loose from da bad kine stuff dey stay in, cuz da angel messenja guy dat Moses wen see inside da bush wen help him fo know dat he da one God wen pick.

36.verse: Moses take da peopo outa Egypt an show dem awesome stuff wit power Egypt side, an by da Red Sea, an in da boonies fo forty years.

37.verse: Moses, he da same guy dat wen tell da Israel peopo lata, ‘God goin send one Guy fo you dat goin talk fo him, jalike he wen send me. An dat One goin come from you guys ohana.’

38.verse: Moses wen stay wit all da peopo dat wen stay togedda inside da boonies, wit all our ancesta guys, an wit da angel guy dat wen talk to him on top Mount Sinai. God wen tell him good stuff fo tell us, an dat stuff still stay going strong.

39.verse: “But our ancesta guys neva like do wat Moses wen say. Inside dea hearts dey like throw him out, an like go back Egypt side.

40.verse: Dey wen tell Aaron, ‘Make odda gods fo us dat can show us da way fo go. Moses wen bring us outa Egypt, but we donno wea he stay now!’

41.verse: Dat time dey wen make one idol kine god dat look jalike one baby cow. Dey wen make sacrifice fo um, an den wen make one big party fo da ting dey wen make wit dea own hands.

42.verse: So God wen turn away from dem, an give dem ova so dey can go down an pray to da sun an da moon an da stars. Dat wen happen jalike da guy Amos, dat wen talk fo God long time ago, wen write down. He wen say, ‘You Israel peopo, Dat no was fo me you wen make sacrifice, Forty years inside da boonies! Nah!

43.verse: You guys wen carry one tent fo da idol kine god Molok, An fo da idol kine star god Refan. Dey da gods you wen make So you can go down an pray to dem. Cuz a dat, I goin send you guys away Fo stay long time one far place Da odda side Babylon.’ ”

44.verse: An den Stephen say, “Our ancesta guys dea inside da boonies wen get da big tent dat show God stay wit dem. Dey make um jalike God wen tell Moses.

45.verse: Dey wen make da tent, an carry um wit dem. Den bumbye Joshua wen bring da peopo inside dis land. God wen push out da diffren peopos dat stay hea. An our ancesta guys wen take away da land from dem. Dat tent wen stay hea long time till King David wen come.

46.verse: God wen do plenny good tings fo David. So David wen aks God fo let him make one mo betta house fo God, da same God dat Davidʼs ancesta Jacob wen pray to.

47.verse: But Davidʼs boy Solomon, he da one wen make dat house fo God.

48.verse: “But da God Dat Stay Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, he no stay everytime inside one house dat peopo make. Jalike da guy Isaiah dat wen talk fo God, wen say, ‘Da Boss say,

49.verse: “Da sky, dass my throne, An da earth, dass da place fo my feets. Wat kine house you goin make fo me? Wea da place fo me fo rest?

50.verse: You tink I not da One dat wen make all dis?’ ”

51.verse: Den Stephen say, “You guys so hard head! Yoa hearts an yoa ears, you no like give um to God! You make jalike yoa ancesta guys! You everytime like beef agains Godʼs Spesho Spirit!

52.verse: Yoa ancesta guys everytime wen make da guys dat wen talk fo God suffa. Yoa ancesta guys even wen kill da guys dat wen tell dat Godʼs Spesho Guy dat everytime do da right ting goin come. An den, you guys wen set him up an wen kill him!

53.verse: No matta was you guys dat wen get da Rules from God, an da angel messenja guys wen bring um, still yet you guys no do wat Godʼs Rules say!”

54.verse: Dey Throw Stones At Stephen - Wen dey hear dat, dey come wild, an dey grind dea teet at Stephen cuz dey mad.

55.verse: But Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a him. An he look up to da sky, an see how awesome God stay, an Jesus standing by Godʼs right side.

56.verse: He say, “Look! I see da sky stay open. An da Guy Dass fo Real stay standing by Godʼs right side!”

57.verse: Den dey wen yell real loud, an dey wen cover dea ears, an dey wen run at him,

58.verse: an drag him outside da town, an start fo throw stones at him. Da guys dat wen talk agains him inside da court, dey wen put down dea coats by one young guyʼs feet, da guy name Saul.

59.verse: Dey all stay throwing stones at Stephen, an he wen tell da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky, “Jesus, you da Boss. Take my spirit!”

60.verse: An he wen fall down on his knees, an wen yell, “Boss, no hold dis bad ting agains dem.” An afta he wen say dat, he wen mahke.

1.verse: Da guy Saul stay dea, an he tink dass good dey wen kill Stephen. Saul Make Jesus Guys Suffa - Dat same day dey wen start fo make all da peopo suffa plenny dat wen come togedda fo church Jerusalem side. So all da peopo dat wen trus da Good Stuff From God wen go all ova Judea an Samaria. But da twelve guys Jesus wen send neva go way.

2.verse: Some guys dat trus God an do wat he say wen bury Stephen, an dey sad an crying real hard cuz he wen mahke.

3.verse: But da guy Saul wen start fo wipe out da peopo dat come togedda fo church. He wen go inside all da houses, an he drag away da guys an da wahines, an throw dem inside da jail.

4.verse: Philip Teach Da Good Stuff Samaria Side - Jesus guys dat wen go all ova wen teach wat God say inside all da places dey wen go.

5.verse: Philip wen go one big town inside Samaria, an teach da peopo ova dea bout da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

6.verse: All da peopo dea wen hear Philip, an dey wen see all da awesome stuff he wen do dat show wat kine guy him, so den dey wen listen real good to da stuff he wen say.

7.verse: Plenny bad kine spirits wen make big noise an let go plenny peopo. Plenny peopo dat no can move an no can walk wen come good.

8.verse: So everybody dat town wen come real, real good inside.

9.verse: Simon da Kahuna Guy - Had one guy name Simon dea dat wen make kahuna dat town. An all da Samaria kine peopo, wen blow dea minds cuz a him. He wen say he one big shot, aah.

10.verse: All da big guys an da odda peopo wen listen to him real good an say, “Dis guy, he da guy dey name ‘Da Big Power From God.’ ”

11.verse: Dey wen stick wit him cuz he stay blow dea minds long time, cuz he wen make da kahuna kine stuff.

12.verse: But Philip wen teach da peopo dea da Good Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea King, an dat Jesus, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. So da guys an da wahines wen trus wat Philip wen say, an he wen baptize dem.

13.verse: Simon, he wen trus Jesus too, an Philip wen baptize him. An Simon wen stick wit Philip all da places he wen go. Philip wen do all kine awesome stuff dat show da power he get, an wen blow Simonʼs mind.

14.verse: Da guys Jesus wen send, dey wen stay Jerusalem side. Dey wen hear dat da peopo Samaria side wen trus wat God wen say. So dey wen send Peter an John ova dea by dem.

15.verse: Wen Peter an John come, dey wen pray fo da peopo, so dey can get Godʼs Spesho Spirit.

16.verse: Cuz Godʼs Spesho Spirit neva take charge a da peopo dea yet. Dey wen get baptize cuz a da One name Jesus ony.

17.verse: Den Peter an John wen put dea hands on top everybody, an den Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a dem.

18.verse: Simon wen see dat Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a da peopo wen da guys Jesus wen send wen put dea hands on top dem. He wen try give dem money, an he say,

19.verse: “You can give me da power too, so dat wen I put my hands on top da peopo, Godʼs Spesho Spirit goin take charge dem?”

20.verse: Peter wen tell him, “You an yoa money goin mahke togedda! Cuz you tink dat you can buy Godʼs gif wit yoa money!

21.verse: You no can work fo God wit us, cuz God see yoa heart no stay right.

22.verse: You betta come sorry cuz a dis real bad ting you wen do, an aks da Boss if he can hemo you from da bad kine stuff you tinking!

23.verse: Cuz I know you stay real jealous an nuha deep inside, an you stay all tie up wit da kine stuff dat no stay right.”

24.verse: Den Simon wen tell Peter an John, “You can pray to da Boss fo me, so dat all dis stuff dat you wen say no happen to me?”

25.verse: Den Peter an John wen tell da peopo wat God wen do fo dem, an dey wen teach wat God wen say. Den wen dey going back Jerusalem side, dey wen teach da Good Stuff From God inside plenny small towns Samaria side.

26.verse: Philip An Da Guy From Etiopia - One angel guy from da Boss wen tell Philip, “Go sout to da road inside da boonies dat go from Jerusalem to Gaza.”

27.verse: So Philip wen go, an he come by one eunuch guy dat no can marry from Etiopia. He one real importan guy dat stay in charge a all da money fo Queen Candace from Etiopia side. Dis guy wen go Jerusalem fo go down an pray to God.

28.verse: Now he going home, an he sitting inside his carriage. He was reading da book dat Isaiah wen write, da guy dat wen talk fo God befo time.

29.verse: Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen tell Philip, “Go by dat carriage, an stay near um.”

30.verse: Philip wen run ova dea, an hear da guy reading Isaiahʼs book. Philip wen aks da guy, “You undastan wat you reading, o wat?”

31.verse: Da Etiopia guy wen say, “I no can undastan um if nobody tell me wat dis mean.” Den he tell Philip fo climb inside da carriage an sit down by him.

32.verse: Da place inside da Bible wea he wen read say, “Dey wen take him away Jalike dey take one sheep away fo kill um. He jalike one baby sheep Dat no make noise Wen dey cutting off his wool. He neva say notting.

33.verse: Dey wen make him shame, An dey neva do da right kine ting fo him. Nobody can talk bout his kids, Cuz his life wen pau Inside dis world.”

34.verse: Da guy wen tell Philip, “Please, tell me who Isaiah stay talking bout. He talking bout himself o one nodda guy?”

35.verse: Den Philip wen teach him. He wen start in dat place wea da guy was reading inside da Bible, an wen tell him da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.

36.verse: Dey stay going on da road, an dey come by some water. An da guy wen say, “Look ova dea! Get water. You can baptize me, yeah?”

37.verse: [Philip wen tell him, “I can baptize you if you trus God inside yoa heart fo real kine.” Da guy wen say, “I trus dat Jesus, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He Godʼs Boy.”]

38.verse: Da guy wen tell his worka guy fo make da carriage stay dea. Den Philip an da guy wen go down inside da water, an Philip wen baptize him.

39.verse: Wen dey wen come outa da water, right den an dea da Bossʼs Spesho Spirit wen take Philip away. Da eunuch guy neva see Philip any moa, but he wen stay going an he feel real good inside.

40.verse: Den Philip wen show up Azotus side, an he wen go all da towns, teaching da Good Stuff From God. An den he go Cesarea side.

1.verse: Saul Wen Change - Saul still yet stay telling da peopo dat stay tight wit da Boss dat he goin kill dem. He wen go da Head Priest guy

2.verse: an wen tell him fo write lettas fo da Jewish churches Damascus side, so dat if he find some guys o wahines ova dea dat stick wit da Stuff bout Jesus, he can take dem inside da prison Jerusalem side.

3.verse: Saul stay going on da road, an come near Damascus. An you know wat? Right den an dea one light from da sky wen flash aroun him.

4.verse: He wen fall down on top da groun, an hear one voice telling him, “Eh, Saul! Saul! How come you making me suffa?”

5.verse: Saul wen aks, “Who you, Boss?” Da voice wen say, “I Jesus, da Guy you stay make suffa.

6.verse: Now stand up an go inside da town, an somebody goin tell you wat you gotta do.”

7.verse: Da guys dat wen go wit Saul wen stay dea an neva say notting. Dey wen hear da voice, but dey neva see nobody.

8.verse: Saul wen stand up, but wen he wen open his eyes, he no can see notting. So dey wen take him by da hand an dey all wen go inside Damascus.

9.verse: Fo three days he no can see notting. An all dat time he neva drink o eat notting.

10.verse: Inside Damascus had one guy name Ananias dat wen stick wit da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. He wen see someting jalike one dream wea da Boss wen tell him, “Ananias!” He say, “Yeah, Boss?”

11.verse: Da Boss wen tell, “Go da guy Judas house on Strait Street, an tell him you like talk to one guy name Saul from Tarsus. He stay praying ova dea.

12.verse: He wen dream an he see one guy name Ananias come an put his hands on top him an den his eyes come good again.”

13.verse: Ananias say, “Boss, I hear bout dis guy plenny times. He do plenny bad kine stuff to da peopo Jerusalem side dat stay spesho fo you.

14.verse: An da main priest guys wen give him power, an he wen come ova hea fo bus all da peopo dat aks you fo help dem.”

15.verse: But da Boss wen tell Ananias, “Go! I wen pick dis guy fo tell who me to da peopos dat not Jews an dea kings an to da Israel peopo too.

16.verse: An I goin show him how plenny he goin suffa cuz he my guy.”

17.verse: Den Ananias wen go da house wea Saul stay, an go inside. He wen put his hands on top Saul, an say, “Brudda Saul, Jesus da Boss, da One dat wen show up by you wen you stay on da road coming ova hea, he wen send me by you, so you can see again, an so His Spesho Spirit goin take charge a you.”

18.verse: Right den an dea someting jalike scales wen fall down from Saulʼs eyes, an he wen see again. He wen stand up, an Ananias wen baptize him.

19.verse: Afta dat he wen eat, an come strong again. Saul Tell Da Good Stuff Bout Christ Damascus Side - Saul wen stay litto wile inside Damascus wit da peopo dat trus Jesus.

20.verse: Right den an dea he wen start fo tell da peopo inside da Jewish churches dat Jesus, he Godʼs Boy.

21.verse: All da peopo dat wen hear Saul, wen blow dea minds, an dey wen tell, “Eh, wass dis? Dis da guy dat wen wipe out da peopo in Jerusalem dat aks da One name Jesus fo help um, yeah? An he wen come ova hea fo take dem to da main priest guys an throw dem inside jail, yeah?”

22.verse: But Saul wen teach wit mo an mo power, an da Jewish peopo dat wen stay Damascus side wen come all mix up, cuz he show proof dat Jesus, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

23.verse: Plenny days lata, da Jewish guys wen come togedda fo talk how dey can kill Saul.

24.verse: But Saul wen hear bout dat. Da Jewish guys stay watch da gates fo da town day an nite, so dey can kill him.

25.verse: But nite time da guys dat wen stick wit Saul, wen put him inside one big basket, an wen let him down thru one puka in da wall nite time.

26.verse: Saul Go Jerusalem - Saul go Jerusalem, an try fo go by da odda guys dat stick wit Jesus, but dey all scared him. Dey neva trus him dat he really stay tight wit Jesus.

27.verse: But Barnabas, he wen take Saul an bring him by da guys Jesus wen send. He tell um dat Saul wen see da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky wen he stay going Damascus side, an da Boss wen talk to him. An inside Damascus he no scared fo use Jesus name fo do stuff.

28.verse: Dass why Saul wen stay ova dea wit dem, an wen go all ova inside Jerusalem. He no scared fo use da Boss name ova dea too fo do stuff.

29.verse: He talk wit da Jewish guys dat talk Greek, an wen try fo show um dat da Good Stuff Bout Jesus stay fo real. But dey wen make plan fo kill him.

30.verse: Wen da bruddas wen find out bout dat, dey wen take Saul Cesarea side, an send him away Tarsus side.

31.verse: Dat time nobody wen bodda da peopo dat wen come togedda fo church all ova Judea, Galilee, an Samaria. Dey wen trus God mo an moa, an Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen kokua dem. Mo an mo peopo wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. An everyting dey wen do, dey do um an get respeck fo God.

32.verse: Peter Go Lydda Side an Joppa Side - Peter wen go all ova dat place, an he wen go stay Lydda side wit da peopo dat stay spesho fo God ova dea.

33.verse: Had one guy ova dea name Eneas. He one guy dat no can move. An he neva can get off his bed fo eight years.

34.verse: Peter wen meet him an tell um, “Eh, Eneas, Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, he make you come good. Stand up an make yoa bed good.” Right den an dea Eneas wen stand up.

35.verse: All da peopo dat stay Lydda side an Sharon side wen see um, an dey all wen trus da Boss right den an dea.

36.verse: Da Wahine Name Dorcas - Had one wahine dat wen trus Jesus inside Joppa town. Her name Tabita. (In Greek talk her name Dorcas. Dat mean “one deer.”) Everytime she do good tings an help da poor peopo.

37.verse: Dat time she wen come sick an wen mahke. Dey wen wash her body, an put um inside one room upstairs.

38.verse: Lydda town stay near Joppa. Wen da guys dat stick wit Jesus wen hear dat Peter stay Lydda side, dey send two guys by him fo beg um, “Try come now!”

39.verse: Peter wen go wit dem, an wen he come, dey take him upstairs to da room. All da widows stand aroun him, crying an showing him da shirts an coats Dorcas wen make wen she wen stay wit dem.

40.verse: Peter tell dem all fo go outside. Den he wen go down on his knees an pray. He wen turn aroun by da mahke wahine, an say, “Eh Tabita! Stand up!” She wen open her eyes, an spock Peter, an wen sit up.

41.verse: He wen take her hand an wen help her stand up. An he tell Godʼs peopo an da widows fo come, an he show um dat she stay alive.

42.verse: All da peopo Joppa side wen hear bout dat, an plenny peopo wen trus da Good Stuff bout da Boss.

43.verse: Peter wen stay Joppa side long time inside Simonʼs house, one guy dat work wit da leather.

1.verse: Peter An Cornelius - Had one guy Cesarea side name Cornelius. He one captain fo six hundred Rome army guys from Italy.

2.verse: Him an his ohana, dey not Jewish, but dey all pray an get respeck fo God. He wen give plenny money fo da poor peopo, an everytime he pray to God.

3.verse: One time, three clock in da aftanoon, he wen see someting jalike one dream. He see one angel messenja guy from God dat wen come by him an say, “Eh, Cornelius!”

4.verse: Cornelius wen look at um real good, an wen come real scared. He say, “Yeah, Boss?” Da angel guy say, “God hear wat you wen aks him fo do, an he rememba all da money you wen give fo da poor peopo.

5.verse: Now send some guys Joppa side fo bring back one guy name Simon, da same guy dey wen call Peter.

6.verse: He stay in da odda Simonʼs house by da sea, da guy dat work wit da leather.”

7.verse: Wen da angel guy go way, Cornelius wen call two a his worka guys an one army helpa. Da helpa guy pray an get respeck fo God too.

8.verse: Cornelius wen tell dem all da stuff dat wen happen, an wen send da three guys Joppa side.

9.verse: Da nex day, noon time, dey stay coming near Joppa. Dat time Peter wen go up on top da flat roof fo pray.

10.verse: He wen come hungry an like eat. Dey stay making da food ready, an he see someting jalike one dream.

11.verse: He see da sky open up, an one ting jalike one big sheet, dat come down on top da groun by da four corners.

12.verse: Inside had all kine animals, da kine dat get four feet, an snakes an lizards from da groun, an birds from da sky.

13.verse: Den one voice wen tell him, “Eh Peter! Stand up! Kill um an eat um!”

14.verse: But Peter wen say, “No way, Boss! I neva eat anyting dat stay kapu an not suppose to eat um!”

15.verse: One mo time da voice wen tell um, “No say dat da kine stay kapu dat God wen make okay.”

16.verse: An dat wen happen three times, an right den an dea da sheet wen go back up to da sky.

17.verse: Peter was tinking wat da dream mean. Right den an dea da guys dat Cornelius wen send, wen find out da house wea Simon da leather guy stay, an dey stop in front da gate fo da house.

18.verse: Dey yell, “Eh, get one guy name Simon Peter ova hea?”

19.verse: Peter still trying fo figga out wat da dream mean, an Godʼs Spirit wen tell him, “Simon, get three guys dat not Jewish, stay downstairs looking fo you.

20.verse: So stand up an go down dea. Go wit dem an no worry, cuz was me wen bring um.”

21.verse: Peter wen go down an wen tell um, “I da guy you stay looking fo. How come you hea?”

22.verse: Da guys say, “Captain Cornelius wen send us. He one good guy dat get respeck fo God, an all da Jewish peopo get respeck fo Captain Cornelius. One spesho angel guy from God wen tell him fo bring you by his house so he can hear wat you get fo say.”

23.verse: Den Peter wen tell da guys fo come inside an make house. Da nex day Peter wen go wit da guys, an some a da bruddas from Joppa wen go too.

24.verse: Da nex day dey wen come Cesarea. Cornelius stay wait fo dem, an he tell his ohana an his good friends fo come his house.

25.verse: Wen Peter go inside da house, Cornelius go in front him, an go down on his knees, cuz he get plenny respeck fo him.

26.verse: But Peter tell um, “Stand up. I ony one guy, you know.”

27.verse: Peter stay talking to him, an dey go inside da house. He see plenny peopo ova dea.

28.verse: He tell um, “You guys know dat our Jewish Rules say dat one Jewish guy no can stay togedda wit one guy dat not Jewish, an da Jewish guy no can go inside da odda guyʼs house. But God wen show me dat I no can say one guy stay kapu.

29.verse: So wen da guys wen tell me fo come ova hea, I wen come lidat, an I neva say I no can. So try tell me why you wen tell me fo come.”

30.verse: Cornelius say, “Three days ago I stay praying inside my house, same time like now, three clock in da aftanoon. An right den an dea one guy in da shiny kine clotheses wen stand in front me.

31.verse: An he say, ‘Cornelius, God wen hear wat you pray, an he know bout all da money you wen give fo da poor peopo.

32.verse: Send some guys Joppa side fo find Simon, da same guy dey call Peter. He stay inside Simonʼs house by da sea, da guy dat work wit da leather.’

33.verse: So right den an dea I wen send dem fo bring you, an you get good heart fo come my house. Now we all stay hea in front God, an we like hear all da stuff God wen tell you fo tell us.”

34.verse: Wat Peter Say - Den Peter wen start fo talk. He tell um, “Now I know dat stay true dat God tink an do da same ting fo everybody.

35.verse: He take everybody in from all da peopos dat get respeck fo him an do da right ting.

36.verse: Dis da Good Stuff dat God wen send peopo fo tell da Israel peopo: ‘Eh! Us guys can come Godʼs friends an feel good inside, cuz a wat Jesus Christ wen do. He da Boss fo everyting an everybody.’

37.verse: You guys know wat wen happen all ova Judea. First da guy John wen tell da peopo in Galilee fo get baptize.

38.verse: An God wen give Jesus from Nazaret his Spesho Spirit an power. Jesus wen go all ova da place, an do da good kine stuff. Da Devil wen take charge a plenny sick peopo wit his power, but Jesus wen even make dem all come good. Jesus wen do dat cuz God wen stay wit him.

39.verse: Us guys wen see all dis stuff happen. He wen do all dat in da Jewish countryside an inside Jerusalem. Dey wen kill him on top one cross.

40.verse: Day Numba three God wen make him come back alive, an wen let some peopo see him.

41.verse: All da peopo neva see um, but us guys dat God wen pick fo tell bout him, we wen see um. We wen eat an drink wit him afta he wen come back alive.

42.verse: He tell us fo teach da peopo an fo tell dem dat we know he da One dat God Wen Send fo judge da peopo dat stay alive an da peopo dat stay mahke.

43.verse: All da guys dat wen talk fo God long time ago wen talk bout him. Dey say dat whoeva trus him, God goin let um go an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do. God goin do dat cuz a wat Jesus wen do.”

44.verse: Da Peopo Dat Not Jews Get Godʼs Spesho Spirit - Wen Peter still talking lidat, Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a all da peopo dat wen hear da Good Stuff From God.

45.verse: Da Jewish guys dat trus Jesus an wen come wit Peter, wen blow dea minds, cuz Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a even da peopo dat not Jews.

46.verse: Cuz dey hear um talking in odda languages an saying good stuff bout God.

47.verse: Den Peter say, “Dese guys, dey can get baptize wit water, yeah? Dey get Godʼs Spesho Spirit, jalike da time wen we wen get um.”

48.verse: So he wen tell um fo get baptize cuz a da One name Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. An dey tell Peter fo stay dea wit dem some moa.

1.verse: Peter Talk To Da Church Guys Inside Jerusalem - Da guys Jesus wen send an da bruddas an sistas all ova Judea side wen hear, dat some a da peopo dat not Jews wen trus wat God wen say too.

2.verse: Wen Peter go Jerusalem, da Jewish bruddas dat trus da Good Kine Stuff Bout Christ wen squawk at him.

3.verse: Dey say, “You go by some peopo dat not Jews, an wen go inside dea house, an eat wit dem.”

4.verse: Den Peter wen tell um all da stuff dat wen happen from da start.

5.verse: He say, “I wen stay Joppa town, an I wen pray. I see someting jalike one dream. Had one big sheet dat come down from da sky by da four corners, an wen come down wea I stay.

6.verse: I wen look inside um real good, an see all kine animals from da earth dat get four feet, wild animals, snakes, lizards, an birds.

7.verse: Den I hear one voice dat say, ‘Eh Peter! Stand up! Kill um an eat um!’

8.verse: But I say, ‘No way, Boss. I neva eat notting dat stay kapu, o dat I not suppose to eat.’

9.verse: Da voice from da sky wen talk again, an say, ‘No say someting stay kapu dat God wen make okay.’

10.verse: Dat wen happen three times, an den da sheet wen go up to da sky again.

11.verse: Right den an dea three guys wen come by da house wea I stay. One nodda guy wen send um by me from Cesarea.

12.verse: Godʼs Spirit wen tell me, ‘No scared fo go wit dem now.’ Dese six bruddas hea, dey wen go wit me Cesarea side. An we wen go inside da guy Cornelius house.

13.verse: Den he wen tell us dat one angel messenja guy wen come by his house an say, ‘Send some guys Joppa town fo bring back one guy name Simon dat dey call Peter.

14.verse: He goin tell you da Good Stuff from me, so dat you an all yoa ohana can come outa da bad kine stuff you stay doing.’

15.verse: Wen I start fo talk, Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a dem, jalike he wen take charge a us at da start.

16.verse: Den I rememba wat da Boss Jesus wen say, ‘John wen baptize da peopo wit water, but God goin baptize you guys diffren kine: he goin let his Spesho Spirit take charge a you.’

17.verse: So, if God give dem da same power he wen give us wen we trus da Boss Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, how can I make big noise agains God?”

18.verse: Wen dey hear dat, dey pau squawk, an dey tell how awesome God stay. Dey say, “Wow! God even let da peopo dat not Jews come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, so dey can get new kine life too!”

19.verse: Da Peopo Dat Come Togedda Fo Church Inside Antiok - Now, da bruddas an sistas dat wen go all ova da place afta Stephen wen mahke, dey wen go all da way Fonicia, Cyprus, an Antiok, cuz Saul dem wen make da peopo dat trus Jesus suffa. An dey wen tell da Good Stuff From God, but dey ony wen tell da Jewish peopo.

20.verse: But some a dem guys dat come from Cyprus an Cyrene, wen go Antiok, an wen start fo talk to da peopo dea dat talk Greek. Dey wen tell um da Good Stuff Bout Jesus da Boss.

21.verse: Da Boss wen help dem, an plenny peopo wen start fo trus him.

22.verse: Da peopo dat wen come togedda fo church inside Jerusalem wen hear bout dat, an dey wen send Barnabas Antiok side.

23.verse: Wen he come, he see dat God wen do plenny good tings fo dem. He wen stay good inside, an wen give dem good kine words fo stick wit da Boss Jesus, an trus him wit all dea heart.

24.verse: Barnabas, he one good guy. Godʼs Spesho Spirit stay in charge a him, an he stay trus da Boss plenny. An he wen bring plenny mo peopo fo trus da Boss Jesus.

25.verse: Den Barnabas wen go Tarsus fo look fo da guy Saul.

26.verse: He wen find him, an wen bring him Antiok. Barnabas an Saul wen stay togedda wit da odda bruddas an sistas dat come togedda fo church ova dea, an dey wen teach plenny peopo fo one year. Antiok was da first place wea odda peopo wen start fo call Jesus peopo “Christian.” Dat mean, “Christ kine peopo.”

27.verse: Dat time some guys dat talk fo God wen come from Jerusalem to Antiok.

28.verse: One a dem guys name Agabus wen stand up an Godʼs Spirit wen tell um fo say, “Goin get hard time all ova, wea eva da Rome peopo stay in charge. No goin get food notting.” (An dat wen happen wen Cesar Claudius wen stay da big king.)

29.verse: Da peopo dat wen stick wit Jesus wen tink fo help da bruddas an sistas dat wen stay Judea side. An every guy wen give um wat he can.

30.verse: Dey wen do dat, an dey wen send da gifs to da older leadas inside da church ova dea, an Barnabas an Saul wen take da money ova dea fo dem.

1.verse: Jesus Peopo Suffa Moa - Az was bout dis time dat King Herod wen bus some a da church peopo fo make um suffa.

2.verse: He make his guys kill Johnʼs brudda James, wit one sword.

3.verse: Wen he wen know dat wen make da Jewish peopo stay good inside, he wen bus Peter too. Dis wen happen wen da Jewish peopo was making da spesho religious time fo da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast.

4.verse: Afta he bus Peter, he put um inside jail, an put sixteen security guards dea so dey can watch um. Herod wen tink fo bring Peter in front da judge an all da peopo afta da Passova.

5.verse: So Peter wen stay inside da jail, but all da church peopo wen pray real hard fo him.

6.verse: Peter Come Outa Jail - Da nite befo dey goin go bring Peter in front da judge, he was sleeping. He was all tie up wit two chains, an he had one guard on da left side an one guy on da right side. An odda guards, dey standing by da door.

7.verse: Right den an dea one angel messenja guy from da Boss Up Dea wen show up, an one light wen shine inside da place. Da angel guy wen shake Peter on da side an wake um up. He say, “Hurry up! Stand up!” An da chains wen fall down from Peterʼs hands.

8.verse: Den da angel guy wen tell um, “Put on yoa odda clotheses an yoa slippas.” An Peter wen do um. Den da angel guy say, “Put on yoa coat an come wit me.”

9.verse: Peter wen go wit him outside da jail, but he neva know if was fo real wat da angel guy doing. He wen tink he stay seeing someting jalike one dream.

10.verse: Dey wen pass by da first guard, an da nex guard, an wen come by one iron gate dat take dem outa da jail fo go inside Jerusalem. Da gate wen open all by itself fo dem, an dey wen go inside Jerusalem. Afta dey wen walk down one street, den da angel guy wen go way.

11.verse: Den Peter wen figga wat wen happen, an he tink, “Now I know I no stay dreaming! Dis fo real! Da Boss Up Dea wen send his angel guy fo take me away from King Herodʼs power, an from all da stuff da Jewish peopo wen tink fo do to me.”

12.verse: Wen Peter figga dis, he come by Maryʼs house. She John Markʼs mudda. Plenny peopo wen go ova dea fo pray.

13.verse: Peter wen knock on da gate, an one helpa girl name Rhoda wen go fo see who stay dea.

14.verse: Wen she hear Peterʼs voice, she wen come plenny good inside, an den she wen run back da house, but neva open da gate. She say, “Eh! Peter stay by da gate!”

15.verse: Dey wen say, “You pupule!” But she still stay telling um, “He stay outside fo real!” Den dey say, “Nah! Must be his angel guy!”

16.verse: But Peter still stay knocking on da gate, an wen dey wen open da gate an see um, dea jaws wen drop.

17.verse: Peter wen wave his hand fo dem fo no talk, an he wen tell um dat da Boss Up Dea wen bring him outside da jail. He say, “Go tell da odda James an all da bruddas bout dis.” An den he wen go one nodda place.

18.verse: In da morning, wen get one big noise wit da guards. Dey tell, “Eh, wat happen? Wea da guy Peter stay?”

19.verse: Dey go tell King Herod, an he wen tell um fo look all ova fo him. But dey no can find um. Herod wen aks da guards dat was watching Peter wat wen happen. Den he wen tell da odda guys fo kill da guards. Latas King Herod wen go from Judea to Cesarea, an wen stay ova dea litto wile.

20.verse: King Herod Mahke - King Herod wen stay huhu wit da peopo Tyre side an Sidon side. So dey all wen come fo talk wit Herod. Da peopo wen come friends wit Blastus, Herodʼs helpa guy, an he wen help um so dey can talk to Herod. Dey wen like make friends wit King Herod, cuz dea food stay come from him.

21.verse: Da day wen come, an Herod wen wear his fancy kingʼs clotheses. He sit down on top his throne, an wen make one big talk to da peopo.

22.verse: Da peopo wen yell, “Dis one god talking, not one guy talking!”

23.verse: But King Herod neva say notting. So right den an dea, cuz Herod neva talk good bout God an tank him, one angel guy from da Boss Up Dea wen wack him, an da worms wen eat um, an he wen mahke.

24.verse: Den mo an mo peopo all ova da place wen trus wat God say.

25.verse: Wen Barnabas an Saul wen do all da stuff God wen send um fo do, dey wen come back Antiok from Jerusalem. An dey wen bring John Mark wit dem.

1.verse: Jesus Guys Pick Barnabas An Saul An Send Um All Ova - Had guys dat wen talk fo God an guys dat wen teach wit da church guys in Antiok: Barnabas, Simeon da Black guy, Lucius from Cyrene, Manaen (da guy dat wen grow up wit King Herod), an Saul.

2.verse: Wen dese guys stay tanking God, an no eating food so dey can pray, Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen say, “Pick Barnabas an Saul, an make dem spesho fo me, fo do da stuff I like um fo do.”

3.verse: Afta dey all wen skip food an pray, dey wen put dea hands on top Barnabas an Saul, an wen send um all ova.

4.verse: Inside Cyprus - So Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen send Saul an Barnabas, an dey wen go Seleucia, an sail from dea to Cyprus.

5.verse: Wen dey come Salamis, dey wen tell wat God say inside da Jewish churches. John Mark wen stay wit dem, an help um wit dea work.

6.verse: Dey wen go thru Cyprus Island to Pafos on da odda side. Ova dea dey wen meet one Jewish kahuna guy name Bar-Jesus. He wen say he talk fo God, but he neva.

7.verse: He one helpa guy fo da governa, Sergius Paulus. Da governa, he one akamai guy. He send one guy fo tell Barnabas an Saul fo come, cuz he like hear wat God say.

8.verse: But Bar-Jesus, da kahuna guy, “Elymas” his name in Greek talk, he neva like wat Saul an Barnabas say, an he wen try turn da governa away so he no trus God.

9.verse: Den Saul, da guy dey wen name Paul too, Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen stay in charge a him. He wen look Elymas in da eye, an say,

10.verse: “You one a da Devilʼs kids, an you hate all da stuff dat stay right! You bulai to da max, an fool all da peopo. Everytime you try change da true stuff from da Boss Up Dea.

11.verse: Now da Boss goin punish you an make you blind fo now, so you no can see da sun.” Right den an dea da mist an da dark wen cover his eyes, an he wen go all ova da place, an wen try find one guy fo lead him by da hand.

12.verse: Wen da governa see dat, he trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus, cuz wat da guys wen teach bout da Boss Up Dea wen blow his mind.

13.verse: In Antiok, Pisidia Side - Paul an da guys dat wen go wit him wen sail from Pafos to Perga, Pamfylia side. Ova dea John Mark wen go way from dem, an go back Jerusalem.

14.verse: Paul an Barnabas, dey go from Perga to Antiok, Pisidia side. On da Rest Day dey wen go inside da Jewish church an wen sit down.

15.verse: Da Jewish leadas wen read from Godʼs Rules, an from wat da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time wen write down inside da Bible. Den dey wen send guys fo tell Paul dem, “Bruddas, if you get someting fo say fo kokua da peopo, try tell us.”

16.verse: Paul wen stand up an wen wave his hand, an say, “You Israel peopo an you peopo dat not Jews dat get love an respeck fo God, listen to me!

17.verse: Da God fo da Israel peopo wen pick our ancesta guys an wen do plenny fo dem wen dey stay Egypt side. He wen lead um outa dat place wit his strong power,

18.verse: an he wen put up wit da stuff dey wen do fo forty years inside da boonies.

19.verse: He wipe out seven peopos Canaan side, an wen give dea land to his own peopo jalike one fadda give land to his boy.

20.verse: All dat wen happen fo bout four hundred fifty years. “Afta dat, God wen give um local leada guys, till Samuel, da guy dat wen talk fo God, wen come.

21.verse: Den da peopo wen like get one king, an God wen give um Saul, Kishʼs boy, from Benjamin ohana. An Saul wen stay king fo forty years.

22.verse: Den God wen take Saul away, an make David dea king. God wen say bout David, ‘I wen see David, Jesseʼs boy. He da kine guy dat make me stay good inside. He do all da kine stuff I like him fo do.’

23.verse: “From Davidʼs ohana, God wen bring Jesus, da One dat can take da Israel peopo outa da bad kine stuff dey do, jalike he wen promise.

24.verse: Befo Jesus wen come, John Da Baptiza Guy wen teach all da Israel peopo dat dey gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey stay do, an get baptize.

25.verse: Wen John pau do all da stuff he wen come fo do, he wen tell da peopo, ‘Who you tink me? I not Godʼs Spesho Guy. Godʼs Spesho Guy goin come afta me. I no stay good nuff fo even do manini kine stuff fo him like help him take off his slippas.’ ”

26.verse: Den Paul say, “My bruddas, you Abrahamʼs kids, an all da guys dat not Jews dat get respeck fo God, God wen send all us guys da Good Stuff dat can take us outa da bad kine stuff we do.

27.verse: Da peopo inside Jerusalem an dea leadas, dey neva know who Jesus. Dey neva undastan wat da guys dat wen talk fo God wen write down, no matta dey read um inside dea Jewish churches every Rest Day. So wat dey wen do, dey wen make all da stuff da Bible wen say come true, cuz dey wen poin finga Jesus.

28.verse: Dey neva find notting wrong dat he gotta mahke, but dey wen tell Pilate fo kill um.

29.verse: Wen dey wen kill Jesus, wen happen jalike da Bible wen say. An afta, dey wen take him down from da cross an wen put him inside one tomb.

30.verse: But God, he wen make him come back alive from mahke.

31.verse: An fo plenny days da guys dat wen go wit him befo from Galilee to Jerusalem, dey wen see him. Now, dey da guys dat tell all dis stuff to da Jewish peopo.

32.verse: “We stay tell you guys da Good Stuff From God. He wen promise our ancesta guys dat he goin do someting,

33.verse: an now he wen do um fo us, dea kids. Dass why he wen bring Jesus back alive from mahke, jalike dey wen write down inside da Song Fo God, Numba Two: ‘Today I tell Dat you my Boy!’

34.verse: God wen tell dat he goin bring Christ back alive from mahke, an Christ no goin mahke again an his body come rotten. He tell Christ, ‘I goin give you plenny a my good an spesho stuff dat stay fo real, Jalike I wen promise David.’

35.verse: An David tell God dis inside one nodda place inside da Bible, ‘You no goin let da guy dat stay good an spesho fo you mahke again An his body come rotten.’

36.verse: David, he wen work fo do wat God like wen he wen stay alive, an den he wen mahke. Dey wen bury him wit his ancesta guys, an his body wen come rotten.

37.verse: But Jesus, da Guy God wen bring back from mahke, he neva mahke again an his body neva come rotten.

38.verse: My bruddas, dass why I like you guys know dis stuff. Cuz a Jesus, we tell you guys dat God can let you guys go, an hemo yoa shame fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do.

39.verse: Da Rules Moses wen write down no can take away dat bad stuff an make you guys get um right wit God. But all da peopo dat trus Jesus, dey goin get um right wit God awready.

40.verse: Watch out dat da bad stuff no happen to you guys dat da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time wen say, ‘Watch out, you guys dat make fun a wat God say, Tink bout dis real good an wipe out. Cuz I goin do someting now Wen you guys stay alive, Someting you guys no goin believe, No matta somebody tell um to you guys.’ ” Dass wat Paul wen tell um.

41.verse: Watch out dat da bad stuff no happen to you guys dat da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time wen say, ‘Watch out, you guys dat make fun a wat God say, Tink bout dis real good an wipe out. Cuz I goin do someting now Wen you guys stay alive, Someting you guys no goin believe, No matta somebody tell um to you guys.’ ” Dass wat Paul wen tell um.

42.verse: Den Paul an Barnabas wen go way from da Jewish church. Da peopo tell um fo talk mo bout dis stuff da nex Rest Day.

43.verse: Wen da peopo go way from da Jewish church, plenny Jewish guys an guys dat wen come jalike Jews wen go wit Paul an Barnabas. Dey wen talk to dose guys, an wen tell um fo stay tight wit da God dat do so plenny good tings fo dem.

44.verse: Da nex Rest Day almos all da peopo inside da town wen come fo hear Paul tell wat da Boss Up Dea say.

45.verse: Wen da Jewish guys wen see all da peopo dey wen come jealous, an wen talk any kine bout da stuff Paul wen say.

46.verse: But Paul an Barnabas, dey no scared. Dey tell um, “First, we gotta tell you guys wat God say. But cuz you guys no trus um, an you no tink you stay good nuff fo get da real kine life dat stay to da max foeva, now we goin go by da peopo dat not Jews.

47.verse: Cuz dis wat da Boss wen tell us fo do, ‘I wen make you guys jalike one light Fo da diffren peopos dat not Jews, So dat you can tell all da peopo all ova da world Dat I can take dem outa da bad kine stuff dey do.’ ”

48.verse: Wen da peopo dat not Jews wen hear dat, dey wen come good inside, an say good stuff bout wat da Boss wen say. An da peopo dat God wen pick fo get da real kine life dat stay to da max foeva, dey wen trus him.

49.verse: Paul dem wen go all ova dat side an tell wat God say.

50.verse: Inside da town had high class wahines dat was religious, an had da leada guys fo da town. Da Jewish guys wen talk stink to dem bout Paul an Barnabas, so dose peopo wen start fo make Paul an Barnabas suffa, an den dey wen throw um outa dat place.

51.verse: So Paul an Barnabas wen shake da dirt from dea feet, fo show da peopo dea dat dey wen had it wit dem, cuz dey no listen. Den dey wen go Iconium side.

52.verse: Da guys dat wen stay tight wit Jesus wen come real good inside, an Godʼs Spesho Spirit stay in charge a dem.

1.verse: Inside Iconium - Now, in Iconium Paul an Barnabas wen go inside da Jewish church jalike dey everytime go. Wat dey wen say inside dea stay right on, an plenny Jewish peopo an peopo dat not Jews wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.

2.verse: But da Jewish peopo dat neva like trus um, dey wen talk to da guys dat not Jews an wen turn um agains Paul an Barnabas guys.

3.verse: Paul an Barnabas stay dea long time, an dey no scared fo talk fo da Boss Up Dea. Dey say dat da Boss get aloha fo do plenny good tings fo da peopo. Da Boss wen show da peopo dat wat Paul an Barnabas say, stay true, cuz he wen give um da power fo do all kine awesome stuff fo show who dem.

4.verse: So some peopo inside Iconium wen stick wit da guys Jesus wen send, an da odda peopo wen stick wit da Jewish guys. An da peopo inside da town wen come half half.

5.verse: Da guys dat not Jews an da Jewish guys an dea leadas wen talk togedda, how dey can make any kine to dem an kill um wit stones.

6.verse: Wen da guys Jesus wen send wen hear dat, dey wen beat it to Lystra an Derbe towns, Lycaonia side, an all da place aroun dea.

7.verse: Dey wen tell all da Good Stuff From God ova dea too.

8.verse: Lystra An Derbe - Had one guy inside Lystra dat no can walk. He wen born lidat.

9.verse: He wen listen to Paul wen he was telling da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. An Paul wen look him in da eye, an know dat da guy trus dat he can come good.

10.verse: So Paul tell um real loud, “Stand up!” An da guy wen jump up, an walk.

11.verse: Wen all da peopo see wat Paul wen do, dey yell in Lycaonia talk, “Da gods wen come down by us, an dey look jalike peopo!”

12.verse: Dey wen name Barnabas “Da god Zeus,” an Paul “Da god Hermes,” cuz he da talka guy.

13.verse: Da priest guy fo Zeus, dat get one temple outside da town, he wen bring cows an leis by da gate fo da town, cuz all da peopo wen like make sacrifice fo Barnabas an Paul.
