14.verse: Wen Jesus guys Barnabas an Paul wen know wat da peopo trying fo do, dey wen rip dea clotheses fo show az wrong wat da peopo doing, an wen run inside da middle a da peopo, an yelling,

15.verse: “Auwe! How come you guys stay doing all dis? We stay peopo too, jalike you guys. We bring da Good Stuff From God fo tell you guys. We say you guys gotta turn away from all dis no good stuff, an turn to da God dat stay alive. He da God dat wen make da sky, da earth, an da sea, an everyting inside um.

16.verse: Befo time he wen let all da diffren peopos inside da world do any kine dey like.

17.verse: But he wen show dem who him. Cuz he wen do good stuff fo dem. He wen give you guys rain from da sky, an plenny fruit fo cut food time. He wen give you guys plenny food fo eat an make you guys stay real good inside.”

18.verse: Wen Paul say dat, all da peopo wen try mo hard fo make sacrifice fo dem.

19.verse: Den some Jewish guys wen come from Antiok, Pisidia side, an from Iconium, an dey wen talk da peopo to ova dea side. Dass why dey wen throw stones at Paul, an wen drag him outside da town, cuz dey tink he stay mahke.

20.verse: But da guys dat stay tight wit Jesus wen come aroun Paul, an he wen stand up, an go back inside da town. Da nex day Paul an Barnabas wen go Derbe town.

21.verse: Dey Come Back Antiok, Syria Side - Paul an Barnabas wen tell da Good Stuff From God Derbe town, an plenny peopo wen learn bout Jesus an come his guys. Den dey wen go back Lystra town, an Iconium, an Antiok.

22.verse: Dey wen give good kine words to da peopo dat stay tight wit Jesus, fo help um stick wit da Good Stuff Bout Jesus so dey can trus Jesus. Dey say, “We gotta suffa plenny befo we see God come our King.”

23.verse: Paul an Barnabas wen pick some guys fo be da older leadas, every place wea da peopo stay come togedda fo church. Dey wen pray an no eat, an aks da Boss fo take care da older leadas, cuz he da one dey stay trus.

24.verse: Den dey wen go da odda side Pisidia, an come Pamfylia.

25.verse: An dey wen tell wat God say Perga town, an den wen go Attalia.

26.verse: Den dey wen sail back from Attalia, an come Antiok. Dass wea dey wen start befo time, wen da bruddas wen aks God fo take care dem an show dem his aloha. Cuz now dey wen pau do all da stuff dey wen tink fo do.

27.verse: Wen dey come ova dea, dey tell all da church peopo fo come togedda, an dey tell um all da stuff God wen help um fo do, an how God wen let da peopo dat not Jews trus da Good Stuff too.

28.verse: An dey stay long time ova dea wit da peopo dat stay tight wit Jesus.

1.verse: Dey Come Togedda In Jerusalem - Some guys dat trus Jesus wen come from Judea to Antiok an dey wen teach da bruddas an sistas. Dey say, “If you no cut skin jalike Moses wen tell our ancesta guys, you no can come outa da bad kine stuff you do.”

2.verse: Paul an Barnabas wen talk agains dat real hard wit dem. So da Antiok church leadas wen pick Paul an Barnabas an some odda guys dat trus Jesus fo go Jerusalem fo talk to da guys Jesus wen send an da older leadas bout dis cut skin stuff.

3.verse: Da Antiok church guys wen send dem. Dey wen go thru Fonicia an Samaria, an dey wen tell da bruddas an sistas dea dat da peopo dat not Jews wen trus Jesus. All da bruddas an sistas wen stay good inside wen dey wen hear dat.

4.verse: Paul an Barnabas guys wen come Jerusalem. Da guys dat come togedda fo church, an da guys Jesus wen send, an da older leadas, dey all wen show dem aloha. An Paul an Barnabas wen tell um all da stuff God wen do wit dem.

5.verse: But some a da Pharisee guys dat wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus wen stand up an say, “Da guys dat not Jews, no matta dey trus Jesus, dey gotta cut skin an do all da odda stuff Moses wen write down inside da Rules.”

6.verse: Da guys Jesus wen send an da older leadas wen come togedda fo talk bout dat.

7.verse: Dey talk fo long time, an den Peter wen stand up an tell um, “Bruddas, you know dat befo time God wen pick me fo go tell da peopo dat not Jews da Good Stuff Bout Jesus so dey can trus him.

8.verse: God, he know wat stay inside us. He show us dat he wen take in da peopo dat not Jews, cuz he wen make his Spesho Spirit take charge a dem, jalike he wen do fo us.

9.verse: God see dem da same, jalike he see us. He wen make dem clean inside, cuz dey wen trus him.

10.verse: Now, how come you guys try find out if God really mean dat he see dem da same jalike us Jewish peopo? Why you guys put hard kine rules on top da guys dat stick wit Jesus? You guys know dat we an our ancesta guys neva can do um.

11.verse: No can! We trus dat we wen come outa da bad kine stuff we do, not cuz we do wat da Rules say, but cuz da Boss Jesus wen do plenny good tings fo us, jalike he wen do fo da peopo dat not Jews.”

12.verse: All da guys wen come quiet fo listen wen Paul an Barnabas tell um bout all da awesome stuff God wen do fo show his power wen dey stay wit da peopo dat not Jews.

13.verse: Wen dey pau talk, James say, “Bruddas, listen to me.

14.verse: Simon Peter wen tell us bout da time God wen show he stay care fo da peopo dat not Jews, cuz he wen pick some peopo fo himself from dem guys.

15.verse: Da guys dat wen talk fo God long time ago, dey say da same ting. Dey wen write dis down inside da Bible, dat God say:

16.verse: ‘Afta dis I goin come back An I goin make Davidʼs ohana come good one mo time, Jalike wen dey fix up one poho house.

17.verse: Den all da odda peopos, Dey can look fo da Boss, An all da peopo dat not Jews dat stay mines, Dey can look fo me too.

18.verse: Dass wat da Boss say. He da One dat do all dis stuff An he wen tell us dis long time ago.’ ”

19.verse: An James say dis too: “Dass why I tink mo betta we no put rules dat goin make um mo hard fo da diffren peopos dat not Jews fo trus God.

20.verse: Mo betta we write um one letta fo help da Jews an da odda peopo get togedda. We tell um fo no eat da food da peopo wen give to da idol kine gods, an no fool aroun, an no eat da meat from da animals dey wen choke, an no eat da blood too.

21.verse: Cuz da Rules Moses wen write down, get peopo teach dat stuff in all da towns from long time ago, an dey read um in all da Jewish churches every Rest Day.”

22.verse: Da Letta Fo Da Peopo Dat Not Jews Dat Trus Jesus - Den da guys Jesus wen send, an da older leadas, an all da Jerusalem church guys, dey wen pick some a dea own guys fo send um Antiok wit Paul an Barnabas. Dey wen pick Judas Barsabbas, an Silas, two guys dat wen lead da bruddas an sistas.

23.verse: Dey wen send dis letta wit dem: “Dis letta from da guys Jesus wen send, an from da older leadas. We stay yoa bruddas. Aloha fo all you bruddas an sistas dat not Jews dat stay Antiok town, an Syria, an Cilicia.

24.verse: We hear dat some guys wen go by you guys from ova hea, but we neva send um. Dey wen bodda you guys, an wat dey wen say bout gotta cut skin, wen make you guys all mix up.

25.verse: So, us guys wen talk togedda, an tink stay good fo pick some guys fo send um by you guys, wit our good friends Barnabas an Paul.

26.verse: Barnabas an Paul almos wen mahke cuz dey stick wit da Boss Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

27.verse: Dass why we send Judas an Silas so dey can tell you guys dat wat we wen write stay true.

28.verse: Godʼs Spesho Spirit an us guys tink no good fo us put hard kine rules on top you guys, ony dis:

29.verse: No eat da meat from da sacrifices dey wen make fo da idol kine gods, no eat blood, o da meat from da animal dey wen choke, an no mo fool aroun. You guys goin do good if you no do dat kine stuff. Dass all.”

30.verse: Dey wen send da guys, an dey wen go Antiok town. Dey wen tell all da church guys fo come togedda, an dey give um da letta.

31.verse: Da peopo wen read um an dey stay good inside, cuz da letta wen kokua dem.

32.verse: Judas an Silas, dey wen talk fo God. So dey kokua da bruddas an sistas fo come strong, an wen help um trus God moa.

33.verse: Dey wen stay dea long time, an den da bruddas wen send um back wit aloha so dey can go by da guys dat wen send um befo.

34.verse: [But Silas wen like stay ova dea.]

35.verse: Paul an Barnabas wen stay Antiok town. Dem an plenny odda guys, dey wen teach wat da Boss Jesus wen say an tell da Good Stuff From God.

36.verse: Paul An Barnabas Split Up - Afta long time Paul wen tell Barnabas, “We go back an stay wit da bruddas an sistas in all da towns wea we wen teach wat da Boss wen say, so we know how dey stay.”

37.verse: Barnabas wen like take John Mark wit dem.

38.verse: But Paul neva like take um, cuz John Mark wen go way from dem befo, in Pamfylia, an neva work wit dem from dat time.

39.verse: Paul an Barnabas no can tink da same way, an dey wen talk hard. So dey wen split up. Barnabas wen take da guy Mark an wen sail up Cyprus side.

40.verse: Paul wen take Silas an wen go way, an da bruddas an sistas wen aks God fo take care dem wit his aloha.

41.verse: Paul dem wen go Syria an Cilicia, an wen kokua da church guys.

1.verse: Timoty Go Wit Paul An Silas - Paul wen go Derbe an Lystra. Had one guy ova dea name Timoty dat wen stay tight wit Jesus. His mudda stay Jewish, an she wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. His fadda not Jewish, he Greek.

2.verse: Da bruddas an sistas inside Lystra an Iconium stay talk good tings bout Timoty.

3.verse: Paul wen like take Timoty wit him wen dey go all ova, so Paul wen cut skin Timoty, cuz da Jewish peopo in dat place know dat his fadda stay Greek.

4.verse: Dey wen go from one town to anodda. An dey wen tell da peopo dea da stuff from da guys Jesus wen send an da older leadas Jerusalem side, wat dey wen say, all dat stuff Jesus guys gotta do.

5.verse: Dey wen kokua all da church peopo, an dat wen make um trus Jesus moa. An den had plenny odda peopo dat wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus too.

6.verse: Paul See Someting Jalike One Dream Inside Troas Town - Dey wen go all ova Frygia side an Galatia side. But Godʼs Spesho Spirit neva let um tell wat God say Asia side.

7.verse: Dey wen come near Mysia, an dey wen try fo go inside Bitynia, but Jesus Spirit neva let um go inside dea.

8.verse: So den dey wen pass by Mysia an wen go Troas town.

9.verse: Dat nite Paul wen see someting jalike one dream. He wen see one guy from Macedonia stand dea an beg um, “Try come ova hea Macedonia side fo help us.”

10.verse: Afta Paul see dat, we wen come ready fast fo go Macedonia side. We tink dat God wen call us fo go tell da Good Stuff From Him to da peopo ova dea.

11.verse: Lydia Trus Da Good Stuff Inside Philippi - We wen sail from Troas strait to Samotrace. Den da nex day to Neapolis.

12.verse: We wen go way from dea an go Philippi, one place da Rome govermen wen run. Dat da main town fo Macedonia. We wen stay ova dea litto wile.

13.verse: On da Rest Day we wen go outside da town by da river side. We wen tink dat get one place fo pray ova dea. We sit down an wen start fo talk story wit da wahines dat wen go ova dea.

14.verse: One wahine dea name Lydia wen listen. She sell purple cloth from Tyatira town. She everytime go down an pray to God. Da Boss Jesus wen open her heart, an she wen like take in wat Paul wen say.

15.verse: Her an her ohana wen get baptize, an she wen tell us, “If you tink I trus da Boss Jesus, try come an stay my house.” So den we wen go wit her.

16.verse: Inside Da Philippi Jail - One time we stay going da place fo pray, an one slave girl come by us. She get one bad kine spirit in charge a her dat help her tell da stuffs dat goin happen bumbye. She wen make plenny money fo her boss guys, cuz she wen tell da peopo wat goin happen to dem.

17.verse: Dat girl wen walk behind Paul an all us odda guys, an yell, “Eh! Dese guys work fo da God Dat Get Mo Power Den All Da Odda Gods. Dese guys, dey stay telling you guys how you can come outa da bad kine stuff you guys stay do.”

18.verse: She stay saying dis plenny days, an dat wen bodda Paul to da max. He wen turn aroun an tell da spirit dat stay in charge a her, “Cuz a Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, I tell you fo let her go!” An right den an dea da spirit wen let go da girl.

19.verse: Wen da bosses fo da slave girl wen know dat dea chance fo make money all pau, dey wen grab Paul an Silas an drag um inside da open market place fo see da leada guys.

20.verse: Da bosses fo da slave girl wen bring um in front da govermen guys, an da boss guys say, “Dese buggas stay Jews, an dey stay make big trouble inside our town.

21.verse: Stay agains our Rules fo us guys believe o do da kine stuff dese buggas teach. Cuz us guys dat get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo, you know.”

22.verse: All da peopo wen come togedda wit dem an stand up agains Paul an Silas. An da govermen guys tell dea guys fo take off Paul an Silas clotheses an whip um.

23.verse: Afta dey wen whip um real hard, dey wen throw um inside da jail. Dey tell da jaila guy fo watch um real good.

24.verse: Wen da jaila guy hear dat, he wen throw um inside da deep jail, an wen lock dea feets in da wood shackles.

25.verse: Midnite, Paul an Silas stay praying an singing songs fo God, an da odda prisona guys inside da jail wen listen to dem.

26.verse: Right den an dea da groun wen shake real hard so da whole jail wen shake. Den all da doors fo da jail wen open. An da chains wen fall off all da prisona guys.

27.verse: Da jaila guy wen wake up. Wen he see dat da jail doors stay open, he pull out his sword fo kill himself, cuz he tink dat da prisona guys wen bag.

28.verse: But Paul wen yell, “Eh! No hurt yoaself! Us guys all stay hea!”

29.verse: Da jaila guy wen tell da odda guys fo bring one light. Den he wen run inside da jail an wen go down in front Paul an Silas. He stay shaking real hard.

30.verse: He wen take um outside da place an say, “You guys, wat I gotta do so I can come outa da bad kine stuff I stay in?”

31.verse: Dey say, “Trus da Boss Jesus, an you goin get outa all da bad kine stuff you wen do. Same ting fo yoa ohana.”

32.verse: Den dey tell him an all his ohana da Good Stuff bout da Boss Jesus.

33.verse: Was nite time, an da jaila guy wen take um an wen wash dea cuts. An right den an dea, him an all his ohana wen get baptize.

34.verse: Da jaila guy wen bring um inside his house, an feed um. Him an his ohana wen feel real good inside, cuz now dey stay trus God.

35.verse: Wen da sun wen come up, da Rome govermen guys wen send da police guys by da jaila guy fo tell him, “Let da guys go.”

36.verse: Da jaila guy wen tell Paul, “Da govermen guys wen say dat you an Silas can go. So, go wit aloha.”

37.verse: But Paul wen tell da police guys, “Dey wen whip us in front all da peopo, but dey neva even check fo find out if we wen do someting wrong. An dey wen throw us inside da jail. But us guys, we get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo too, you know. An now dey like send us away so nobody know. No way! Da govermen guys, dey da guys gotta come an take us outside demself.”

38.verse: Da police guys wen tell da govermen guys wat Paul an Silas wen say. Wen dey wen know dat Paul an Silas get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo, dey wen come real scared.

39.verse: Da govermen guys wen come an tell Paul an Silas dey sorry, an take um outside da jail, an beg um fo go way from da town.

40.verse: Afta Paul an Silas wen go outside da jail, dey wen go Lydiaʼs house. Dey wen meet da bruddas an sistas dea, an give um good kine words. Den dey wen go.

1.verse: Inside Tessalonika - Dey wen go thru Amfipolis an Apollonia, an wen come Tessalonika. Had one Jewish church ova dea.

2.verse: Paul wen go da Jewish church, jalike he everytime wen go. Fo three week on da Rest Day he wen talk to dem bout da Bible.

3.verse: He wen teach um an show um dat da Spesho Guy God Wen Send gotta suffa an come back alive from mahke. He say, “Dis guy Jesus I stay tell you guys bout, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.”

4.verse: Some a da Jewish peopo wen trus wat he say, an wen go wit Paul an Silas. An plenny guys dat not Jewish dat get plenny respeck fo God, an plenny wahines dat stay importan, dey wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus too.

5.verse: But da Jewish guys wen come jealous. So dey wen get togedda some bad kine guys from da market place, an dey wen come one big gang, an wen start one big beef inside da town. Dey wen run by one guy name Jasonʼs house fo look fo Paul an Silas so dey can bring um outside by da peopo.

6.verse: But dey no can find um. Az why dey wen drag Jason an some odda bruddas in front da town leadas. Dey wen yell, “Dese guys, dey wen make big trouble all ova da whole world, an now dey stay come ova hea.

7.verse: Dis guy Jason wen tell dem fo make house his place. An dey all stay broke King Cesarʼs rules, cuz dey say get one nodda King, one guy name Jesus.”

8.verse: Wen dey hear dat, all da peopo an da town leadas, wen bodda dem plenny.

9.verse: Den dey wen make Jason an da odda guys pay some money, an dey wen let um go.

10.verse: Inside Berea - Dat nite da bruddas wen send Paul an Silas away to Berea. Wen dey wen come ova dea, dey wen go da Jewish church.

11.verse: Da Berea peopo, dey mo betta den da Tessalonika peopo, cuz dey wen like take in da Good Stuff Bout Jesus, an dey wen check out wat da Bible wen say from befo time, every day, fo find out if wat Paul wen say stay true.

12.verse: Plenny Jewish peopo, an plenny wahines dat not Jewish dat stay importan, an plenny guys dat not Jewish, dey all wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.

13.verse: Wen da Jewish guys inside Tessalonika wen know dat Paul stay teach wat God say inside Berea, dey wen go ova dea too, an dey wen make plenny peopo like beef.

14.verse: Da bruddas wen send Paul da coast side fast, but Silas an Timoty wen stay inside Berea.

15.verse: Da guys dat wen go wit Paul wen take him to Athens. Den dey wen go back an wen tell Silas an Timoty fo go by Paul fast.

16.verse: Inside Athens - Paul wen wait fo dem inside Athens, an he wen bum out wen he wen see had plenny idol kine gods ova dea.

17.verse: He wen go da Jewish church an wen talk wit da Jewish peopo bout da Good Stuff, an da Greek peopo dat had plenny respeck fo God, he wen talk wit dem too. An, he wen go da market place every day an talk to da peopo dat stay come dea.

18.verse: Some teachas dat tink like da guy Epicureas an odda teachas dat tink like da Stoic guys, dey wen come fo talk wit Paul. Some a dem wen say, “Wat dis mynah bird guy trying fo say?” Odda guys wen say, “Sound like he telling bout odda peopoʼs gods.” Dey wen say, dat cuz Paul stay teaching da Good Stuff Bout Jesus, an telling peopo dat Jesus wen come back alive from mahke.

19.verse: Den dey wen take Paul in front da leada guys dat stay come togedda on top Ares Hill. Dey say, “Tell us bout dis new kine stuff you stay teach.

20.verse: You stay tell us some stuff we no can figga, an we like know wat dat mean.”

21.verse: (You know, all da peopo from Athens an da peopo from odda places dat stay dea, dey everytime talk bout an listen to da new kine stuff. Dass all dey do.)

22.verse: Paul wen stand up in da middle a dem guys on top Ares Hill, an say, “You guys from Athens, I see dat you guys everytime do da religious kine stuff.

23.verse: Cuz wen I wen walk aroun an see all da places wea you guys go down an pray, I even wen find one altar place dat get one writing on top um dat say, ‘Fo Da God We Donno.’ Now I goin tell you bout da god dat you go down an pray to, dat you donno.

24.verse: Da God dat wen make da world an all da stuff inside um, he da Boss fo da sky an da earth. He no stay inside da temples da peopo make.

25.verse: Peopo no need take care him jalike if he stay need someting. Cuz he da One dat stay make all da peopo alive, an he give dem air fo breathe, an all da odda stuff.

26.verse: From one guy, God wen make all da peopos, so dey can stay all ova da world. He wen make da times an da places fo dem fo stay.

27.verse: God wen do dat so da peopo can go look fo him. Den might be dey goin reach out an find him. But he no stay far from every one a us guys.

28.verse: ‘Cuz a him we stay an move an do everyting.’ Jalike yoa own poet guys wen say, ‘We stay his kids.’

29.verse: Cuz we stay his kids, no good if we tink dat God stay jalike one idol kine god dat one guy wen tink bout an make from gold o silva o one stone.

30.verse: Befo time God wen let da peopo tink dat stuff, cuz dey neva know, but now he stay tell all da peopo all ova da world dat dey gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an pau do um.

31.verse: He wen make one day wen he goin judge everybody inside da world. He goin send one guy fo judge um da right way. He wen show dat dis stay true cuz he wen bring dat guy back alive from mahke.”

32.verse: Wen dey wen hear him say dat one guy wen come back alive from mahke, some a dem guys wen make fun a him. But odda guys say, “We like hear you talk bout dis stuff one mo time.”

33.verse: Den Paul wen go way from da main leadas.

34.verse: Some guys wen go wit Paul an trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. One a dem guys name Dionysius, he wen stay one leada guy, an one wahine name Damaris, an odda peopo, dey wen trus Jesus.

1.verse: Inside Corint - Afta dat Paul wen go way from Athens an wen go Corint.

2.verse: Ova dea he wen come by one Jewish guy name Aquila. He from Pontus, an he jus wen come from Italy wit his wife Priscilla. Cesar Claudius da Big King wen tell all da Jewish peopo fo get outa Rome town, az why. Paul wen go an talk wit dem.

3.verse: Paul make tents, an Aquila an Priscilla wen make um too, so he wen stay wit dem an work wit dem.

4.verse: Every Rest Day he talk plenny wit da Jewish peopo an da peopo dat not Jewish inside da Jewish church fo try help um trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.

5.verse: Silas an Timoty wen come from Macedonia. An den Paul wen ony talk to da Jewish peopo everytime. He tell um da Good Stuff Bout Jesus, dat he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

6.verse: But wen da Jewish guys wen stand up agains Paul an wen talk bad to him, he wen shake out his clotheses fo show he wen had it wit dem, an wen tell um, “You guys get da blame if you guys goin be cut off from God! I no mo da blame fo dat. Now I goin go talk wit da peopo dat not Jews.”

7.verse: Den he wen go way from da Jewish church, an wen go nex door, da house wea one guy name Titius Justus live. Dat guy, he get plenny respeck fo God.

8.verse: Crispus, he da leada guy fo da Jewish church. Him an all his ohana wen trus da Boss Jesus. An had plenny peopo from Corint dat wen hear Paul an trus Jesus too, an wen get baptize.

9.verse: One nite Paul wen see someting jalike one dream. Da Boss Jesus wen tell him, “No need be scared. No give up telling da Good Stuff.

10.verse: Cuz I stay wit you, an nobody goin hurt you. Plenny peopo from dis town, dey stay mines.”

11.verse: So Paul wen stay ova dea an wen teach um wat God wen say fo one year an a half.

12.verse: Wen Gallio stay governa fo Akaia, da Jews wen gang up on Paul an wen take him in front da governa.

13.verse: Da Jews wen tell da governa, “Dis guy, he stay make da peopo go down an pray to God da way dat stay agains our Rules.”

14.verse: Paul wen start fo talk, but Governa Gallio wen tell da Jews, “If you Jewish guys wen squawk bout someting dat stay wrong o some crime, den dass good fo me fo listen to you guys.

15.verse: But you guys squawk bout how da guy talk, an names, an yoa own rules. So you guys make um right yoaself. I no goin judge dat kine stuff.”

16.verse: An he wen tell his guys fo throw um outside da place.

17.verse: Den da Jewish guys wen grab Sostenes, da Jewish church leada guy, an wen bus um up in front da governa. But Gallio neva care bout dat.

18.verse: Paul Go Back To Antiok - Paul wen stay Corint long time. Den he wen go way from da bruddas an wen sail Syria side. Priscilla an Aquila wen go wit him. Befo Paul wen sail, he cut off his hair inside Kenkrea, cuz he wen make one promise fo do someting.

19.verse: Dey wen come Efesus, an Paul wen go way from Priscilla an Aquila. Paul wen go inside da Jewish church, an wen talk to da Jewish peopo fo help um trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.

20.verse: Dey wen tell him fo stay ova dea some moa, but he neva like.

21.verse: Wen he stay going, he wen promise dem, “I goin come back if az wat God like.” Den he wen sail from Efesus.

22.verse: Wen Paul wen come Cesarea, he wen go show face to da church guys. Den he wen go Antiok.

23.verse: He wen stay Antiok long time. Den he wen go all ova Galatia an Frygia, an wen kokua da peopo dat stay tight wit Jesus.

24.verse: Apollos Stay Inside Efesus An Corint - One Jewish guy name Apollos wen come to Efesus. He from Alexandria. He one guy dat wen go school long time, an he know plenny stuff from da Bible.

25.verse: Befo time odda bruddas wen teach him bout da Boss Jesus, an da way he wen talk, everybody know he tink dass importan. He wen teach da right way bout Jesus. But he ony know bout da guy Johnʼs baptism.

26.verse: He wen start fo talk wit power inside da Jewish church. Wen Priscilla an Aquila hear him, dey tell him fo come dea house. An dey teach him bout Jesus way mo betta.

27.verse: Apollos wen like go Akaia, an da bruddas wen kokua him. Dey wen write one letta fo da bruddas an sistas ova dea, so dey goin give Apollos dea aloha. Wen he go ova dea, he wen help da peopo dat wen trus God cuz God wen do plenny good tings fo dem.

28.verse: An he wen talk wit plenny power to da Jewish guys in front all da peopo. He show um proof from da Bible dat Jesus, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

1.verse: Paul Stay Inside Efesus - Apollos wen stay inside Corint. Paul wen go da back road, an come Efesus. He find some guys dat trus God ova dea.

2.verse: He aks um, “You wen get Godʼs Spesho Spirit fo take charge you wen you wen trus God, o wat?” Dey say, “We neva even hear bout Godʼs Spesho Spirit befo dis.”

3.verse: Paul say, “Wat kine baptism you wen get?” Dey say, “Da kine baptism John wen make.”

4.verse: Paul say, “Johnʼs baptism stay fo da peopo dat come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an pau do um. He tell dem fo trus da Guy dat goin come bumbye, Jesus.”

5.verse: Wen dey hear dat, dey wen get baptize fo show dey wen trus da Boss Jesus.

6.verse: Wen Paul wen put his hands on top dem, Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take charge a dem. So den dey wen talk odda kine talk, an wen tell wat God wen say.

7.verse: Had bout twelve guys ova dea dat time.

8.verse: Paul wen go inside da Jewish church. Fo three months he not scared fo tell da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. He teach um real good bout how dey can get God fo dea King, so dey can trus him.

9.verse: But some a dem wen get all hard head. Dey neva like trus da Good Stuff, an dey wen talk any kine in front everybody bout da Boss Jesus way. So den Paul wen go way from dem. He wen take da guys dat stay tight wit Jesus wit him, an dey wen talk togedda every day inside da big room at Hale O Tyrannus.

10.verse: Dey wen do dat fo two years, an all da Jewish peopo an da peopo inside Asia dat talk Greek wen hear wat da Boss Jesus wen say.

11.verse: Scevaʼs Boys - God wen help Paul do real awesome stuff wit power.

12.verse: Dey wen take handkerchiefs an aprons dat he wen touch, an bring um by da sick peopo, an dey wen come good. An da bad kine spirits wen let da peopo go.

13.verse: Had some Jewish guys dat wen go all ova an make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo. Dey wen try use da Boss Jesus name fo make da bad kine spirits let um go. Dey say, “Wit Jesus power, da guy Paul talk bout, I tell you bad kine spirits fo let go da guy.”

14.verse: Had one a da Jewish main priest ohana guys name Sceva dat get seven boys. Dey wen make lidat.

15.verse: But da bad kine spirit wen tell dem, “I know who Jesus, an I know who Paul, but who you guys?”

16.verse: Den da guy dat get da bad kine spirit wen jump um, an hold um down. Den he wen bus um all up. So den dey wen all run outside da house naked an all bleeding.

17.verse: Da Jewish peopo an da Greek peopo dat stay inside Efesus wen hear bout dat, an dey wen all come real scared. An dey wen get plenny respeck fo da Boss Jesus.

18.verse: Plenny peopo dat trus da Boss now, wen come fo tell everybody all da bad kine stuff dey wen do.

19.verse: Befo time, plenny a dem guys wen make da kahuna. So dey wen come an pile up all dea kahuna books, an burn um in front everybody. Wen dey wen figga how plenny da books cost, wen cost um fifty tousand silva piece.

20.verse: Dass how plenny peopo wen hear wat da Boss Up Dea wen say, an trus him, an wen do wat he say.

21.verse: Da Big Beef Inside Efesus - Afta all dat wen happen, Paul wen tink fo go Jerusalem, an go thru Macedonia an Akaia. He say, “Afta I go ova dea, den I gotta go Rome too.”

22.verse: He wen send two a his helpa guys Macedonia side, Timoty an Erastus. But he wen stay Asia side litto wile moa.

23.verse: Dat time some guys wen make big trouble bout Jesus way.

24.verse: Had one guy name Demetrius dat wen make stuff from silva. He make silva tings dat look jalike da temple fo da idol kine wahine god Artemis. Da guys dat work fo him wen make plenny money.

25.verse: He tell um all fo come, an da worka guys dat wen make odda stuff fo dem. An he wen say, “Eh, you guys, you know us guys get plenny money cuz a all da stuff we make.

26.verse: An you guys see an hear dat dis guy Paul wen make plenny peopo trus dis odda stuff, an wen turn away plenny peopo hea inside Efesus, an all ova Asia. He say da idol kine gods da peopo make no stay gods fo real.

27.verse: Cuz a dat da peopo goin talk stink bout da stuff us guys make, an mo worse, dey goin tink da temple fo da big wahine god Artemis no good. She stay awesome, an da peopo all ova Asia an da world go down an pray to her. But dese guys, bumbye dey goin wipe her out!”

28.verse: Wen da peopo wen hear dat, dey wen come plenny huhu, an wen start fo yell, “Artemis from Efesus, she get plenny power!”

29.verse: Right den an dea, all da peopo inside Efesus wen come all mix up an wen make big noise. Da peopo wen grab Gaius an Aristarkus, two guys from Macedonia dat wen stay wit Paul, an dey all wen run togedda inside da stadium.

30.verse: Paul wen like go in front da peopo, but Jesus guys neva let him.

31.verse: Even some a da leada guys fo Asia, dey Paulʼs friends, an dey wen send him one letta dat say, “No go inside da stadium!”

32.verse: Everybody wen stay all mix up. Some guys wen yell one ting, an odda guys one nodda ting. Plenny peopo neva know how come dey wen go ova dea.

33.verse: Da Jewish peopo wen push one guy name Alexander in front, an some a da peopo wen yell at him wat fo do. He wen wave his arms fo tell dem fo no make noise so he can talk.

34.verse: But wen da peopo wen figga dat he one Jewish guy, dey all yell togedda fo two hours, “Artemis from Efesus, she get plenny power!”

35.verse: Den da town secretary fo Efesus wen make da peopo shut dea mouts, an say, “You peopo from Efesus! Everybody know dat Efesus town take care a da temple fo da importan wahine god Artemis, an her idol dat drop down from da sky, yeah?

36.verse: Nobody can say dass not true! Dass why you guys betta shut yoa mouts an no do someting stupid.

37.verse: You guys bring dese guys ova hea, an dey neva steal notting from da temple, an dey neva talk stink bout our wahine god.

38.verse: So den, if Demetrius an his worka guys get anyting fo say agains somebody, dey can go in front da judge an da governas. Dey can make one squawk agains um ova dea.

39.verse: If you get mo tings you like fo say agains dem, you gotta come togedda an do um jalike da rules say.

40.verse: Cuz dis way, da army guys can bus us fo make big beef, cuz we no can tell um stay good we wen make lidis.”

41.verse: Wen he wen pau say dat, den he wen tell everybody fo go home.

1.verse: Paul Dem Go Macedonia An Greece - Wen da big noise wen pau, Paul wen tell Jesus guys fo come by him. He wen kokua dem, an wen tell um aloha, an den wen go Macedonia.

2.verse: He wen go thru Macedonia, an wen talk to da peopo ova dea an kokua dem. An den he wen go Greece side.

3.verse: He wen stay ova dea three months. He stay ready fo sail Syria side, but da Jewish guys wen make plan fo kill him, so he wen go back thru Macedonia.

4.verse: Sopater from Berea, Pyrrhus boy, an Aristarkus an Sekundus from Tessalonika, Gaius from Derbe, Timoty, an Tykicus an Trofimus from Asia, dey all wen go wit him.

5.verse: Dem guys wen go ahead an wen wait fo us inside Troas.

6.verse: We wen sail from Philippi afta da spesho religious time fo da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast. Five days afta dat we wen go by da guys inside Troas, an we wen stay ova dea one week.

7.verse: Da Last Time Paul Go Troas - Da first day in da week we wen come togedda fo broke bread an eat fo rememba dat Jesus wen mahke. Den Paul wen teach da peopo. Cuz he wen like go way da nex day, he wen talk till da middle a da nite.

8.verse: Had plenny lamps inside da place upstairs wea we wen stay.

9.verse: One young guy name Eutykus wen sit by da window. He wen come sleepy wen Paul stay talk. Wen he wen sleep, he wen fall down on top da groun from three floors up. Dey wen pick um up, an jalike he mahke.

10.verse: Paul wen go down dea, an throw himself on top da guy, an wen put his arms aroun him. He say, “No worry, he still stay alive!”

11.verse: Den he wen go upstairs again, an wen broke da bread, an eat. He talk to dem till da sun wen come up, an den he wen go.

12.verse: Da peopo wen take da young guy Eutykus home, an dey wen feel good inside cuz he alive.

13.verse: Paul Sail From Troas To Miletus - Paul wen tell us guys fo go by da boat an sail aroun da poin to Assos, cuz he wen like walk ova dea.

14.verse: He wen meet us Assos side, an he wen come inside da boat. An den we wen all go Mitylene.

15.verse: Da nex day we wen sail from dea, an wen go Kios Island. Da nex day we wen cross ova to Samos Island, an da nex day we wen go Miletus town, da Asia mainland.

16.verse: Paul wen tink fo go aroun Efesus. He no like stay Asia side, cuz he wen like go Jerusalem fo Pentecost Day fifty days afta Passova, if he can make um.

17.verse: Paul Tell Da Older Leadas From Efesus Aloha - From Miletus Paul wen send somebody fo tell da older church leada guys from Efesus fo come by him.

18.verse: Wen dey wen come ova dea, he wen tell um, “You guys know how I stay all da time, from da first day I wen stay wit you guys Asia side.

19.verse: I wen work fo da Boss Jesus wit good heart. An I was crying, cuz da Jewish guys wen make me suffa plenny, an wen try kill me.

20.verse: You guys know I no stay scared fo teach you guys all da stuff dat goin kokua you. I wen teach you guys in front all da peopo, an inside yoa house.

21.verse: I tell da Jewish peopo an da peopo dat not Jewish, dat dey gotta come by God, an come sorry an like pau all da bad kine stuff dey stay do, an no do um no moa, an dey gotta trus our Boss Jesus.

22.verse: Now, Godʼs Spesho Spirit stay telling me fo go Jerusalem. I donno wat goin happen to me ova dea.

23.verse: I ony know dat Godʼs Spesho Spirit been telling me dat I goin suffa an go jail every place I go.

24.verse: But den, fo me, fo stay alive, dass notting. I ony like do everyting da Boss Jesus wen tell me fo do to da end. He wen tell me fo tell everybody da Good Stuff bout how plenny good tings God do fo us.

25.verse: “I wen go all ova da place wea you guys stay, an wen tell you guys bout how bout how peopo can get God fo dea King. I know dat none a you guys goin eva see me any moa.

26.verse: Dass why I stay tell you guys today dat nobody can blame me fo anodda guy if dat guy no trus God, an cut himself off from God,

27.verse: cuz I no scared fo tell you guys all da stuff God like you guys fo do.

28.verse: Watch out fo yoaself an fo all da peopo dat Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen give you guys fo take care dem. You guys gotta take care da church guys jalike one sheep farma take care his sheeps. Cuz da Boss Jesus wen bleed an mahke fo make dem Godʼs kids.

29.verse: I know dat afta I go, some guys jalike wild dogs goin come by you guys fo try wipe you guys out.

30.verse: Some a dem guys goin come from you guys. Dey goin change da true stuff fo take some peopo wit dem.

31.verse: So watch out, you know! Rememba dat fo three years I neva stop telling all you guys day an nite bout dis stuff, an I even wen cry bout um.

32.verse: “Now, I give you guys ova to God, an I tell you fo listen to wat God say bout how he like do good tings fo peopo. All dat can make you guys come strong inside an give you guys all da good stuff God get fo all his kids. Dey stay spesho fo him.

33.verse: I neva like get odda peopoʼs silva o gold o clotheses.

34.verse: You guys know dat I wen work fo all da stuff me an my friends need.

35.verse: I do all dat fo show you guys dat by dis kine hard work we gotta help da guys dat no stay strong inside. I rememba wat da Boss Jesus wen say, ‘Da guy who give, he stay mo good inside den da guy who get.’ ”

36.verse: Wen he say dat, he wen go down on his knees wit all dem guys an wen pray.

37.verse: Dey all cry an dey wen hug him an kiss him bye.

38.verse: Dey was mo sad cuz he wen say dey no goin see him no moa. An dey wen go wit him to da boat.

1.verse: Paul Go Jerusalem - Afta us guys wen go way from dem, we wen sail strait to Cos Island. Da nex day we wen go Rhodes Island, an den Patara town, da Asia mainland.

2.verse: We wen find one boat dat stay goin Fonicia side, an we wen go on top um an wen sail away.

3.verse: We wen see Cyprus, an pass sout from dea, an wen go Syria. We wen go outa da boat at Tyre, wea dey wen take off all da stuffs from da boat.

4.verse: We wen find da peopo dat stay tight wit Jesus ova dea, an we wen stay wit dem fo seven days. Dey wen try fo tell Paul fo no go Jerusalem, cuz Godʼs Spirit wen tell um dat.

5.verse: But wen da time wen come, we wen go way from dea. All da guys an da wahines an da kids wen go wit us outside da town. An by da beach we wen go down on our knees an wen pray.

6.verse: Afta we wen tell each odda aloha, we wen go inside da boat, an dey wen go home.

7.verse: We wen sail from Tyre to Tolemais. We wen tell da bruddas an sistas aloha ova dea, an wen stay wit dem one day.

8.verse: Da nex day we wen go Cesarea. We stay Philipʼs house. He one guy dat tell peopo da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. He one a da Seven guys dey wen pick befo time fo help give da widows food.

9.verse: He get four girls dat neva marry yet. God wen give da girls da power fo tell odda peopo wat God say.

10.verse: Afta we wen stay dea litto wile, one guy name Agabus dat talk fo God wen come from Judea.

11.verse: He wen come by us, an wen take Paulʼs belt. He wen tie up his own hands an feet wit um, an say, “Godʼs Good an Spesho Spirit say dis, ‘Da Jewish leada guys inside Jerusalem goin tie up da guy who own dis belt lidis. An dey goin give dat guy to da peopo dat not Jews.’ ”

12.verse: Wen we hear dat, we an all da peopo ova dea wen beg Paul fo no go Jerusalem.

13.verse: Den Paul say, “Why you crying an stay broke my heart? I stay ready fo get all tie up, an even fo mahke inside Jerusalem cuz I da Boss Jesus guy.”

14.verse: We no can make Paul stay, so we pau try. An we say, “Wat da Boss like, dass wat goin happen.”

15.verse: Afta litto wile we wen get our stuffs, an go Jerusalem.

16.verse: Some a da guys from Cesarea dat stay tight wit Jesus, dey wen go wit us too. Dey wen take us Mnasonʼs house, an we wen stay ova dea. He one guy from Cyprus an one a da first guys dat wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.

17.verse: Paul Go See James - Wen we wen come Jerusalem, da bruddas wen show us plenny aloha.

18.verse: Da nex day Paul an all us guys wen go by James. All da older leadas, dey stay dea too.

19.verse: Paul wen give dem his aloha. He wen tell um all da stuff God wen help him fo do fo da peopo dat not Jews.

20.verse: Afta dey hear dat, dey tell, “God, he awesome!” Den dey tell Paul, “Look brudda, how plenny tousand Jewish peopo wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. An dey all stick wit all da stuff da Rules say.

21.verse: Dey wen hear dat you teach all da Jewish peopo dat live near peopo dat not Jews, dat dey gotta turn away from wat Moses wen write. An dey say dat you say dey no need cut skin dea kids, o do da odda stuff our peopo do.

22.verse: So, wat we goin do? Fo shua dey goin hear dat you wen come ova hea.

23.verse: So, dis wat we tell you fo do. Get four guys hea dat wen make one strong promise in front God, an fo dat kine promise, dey no cut dea hair from da time dey make da promise.

24.verse: Now, someting wen happen dat make dea promise pau. Cuz a dat, dey gotta do da religious kine stuff fo seven days so dey can go back in front God. Afta dat, dey gotta make sacrifice an shave dea heads fo show dat da promise pau. So den, take dese guys, an go wit um fo do da religious kine stuff. You pay da money fo make da sacrifice dem guys gotta make befo dey can shave dea heads. Den all da peopo goin know dat da stuff dey wen hear bout you no stay true, but you stay do all da stuff da Rules say too.

25.verse: But da peopo dat not Jews an stay tight wit Jesus, we wen awready write dem one letta. We tell um dey betta not eat da meat from da sacrifices fo da idol kine gods, o blood, o da meat from da animals dey wen choke, an no mo fool aroun.”

26.verse: Da nex day Paul wen take da guys to da temple yard fo do da stuff dey gotta do so dey can go in front God. Den he wen go inside da temple an tell da priest guys wat day da spesho time goin pau, so da priest guys can make da right offering fo da four guys.

27.verse: Dey Bus Paul - Wen da seven days fo do da religious kine stuff almos pau, some Jewish guys from Asia wen spock Paul inside da temple yard. Dey wen make all da peopo like beef, an wen grab Paul.

28.verse: Dey yell, “Eh! You Israel guys! Come help us! Dis da guy dat stay teach da peopo all ova da place fo go agains our peopo, an agains our Rules an our temple. One nodda ting, he wen bring guys dat not Jews inside da temple yard, an make dis place dat stay spesho fo God, all pilau so no can pray dea.”

29.verse: (Dass cuz befo dey wen see Trofimus, da guy from Efesus, inside Jerusalem wit Paul, an dey wen tink Paul wen bring him inside da temple yard.)

30.verse: All da peopo from Jerusalem wen come all mix up, an dey wen come running from all ova da place. Dey wen grab Paul, an wen drag him from da temple yard. An right den an dea da priest guys wen shut da temple gates.

31.verse: Da peopo stay trying fo kill him, an da main captain fo da Rome army guys wen hear dat all da peopo from Jerusalem stay make big beef.

32.verse: Right den an dea he wen take some captains an odda army guys an dey wen run by da peopo. Wen da guys dat stay make big beef wen spock da main captain an da army guys, dey wen pau bus up Paul.

33.verse: Da main captain wen come an wen bus Paul, an tell da guys fo tie um up wit two chains. Den he aks, “Who dis guy? Wat he wen do?”

34.verse: Some guys wen yell one ting, an some odda guys anodda ting. Da main captain no can find out da trut bout wat wen happen. So he wen tell da guys fo take Paul inside da army place.

35.verse: Wen Paul wen come near da door, da peopo wen come wild, so da army guys wen carry him.

36.verse: All da peopo dat wen go wit dem wen yell, “Kill um!”

37.verse: Paul Talk To Da Peopo - Da army guys wen start fo take Paul inside da army place, an he wen tell da main captain, “Eh, try listen to me!” Da captain say, “You talk Greek?

38.verse: You not da guy from Egypt dat wen start one big beef befo time, an wen take four tousand rebel guys inside da boonies?”

39.verse: Paul say, “No, I not! I one Jewish guy. I wen born Tarsus, Cilicia side. I one citizen from dat big town. Try let me talk to da peopo.”

40.verse: Da main captain wen let um talk, an Paul wen stand on top da steps, an wen wave his hand to da peopo. Wen dey pau yell, he wen talk to dem in local talk.

1.verse: Paul wen say, “My bruddas an faddas, listen to me! I like talk fo myself.”

2.verse: Wen dey hear dat he wen talk da local language to dem, den dey wen pau yell, an wen listen. Den Paul say,

3.verse: “I one Jewish guy. I wen born Tarsus town, Cilicia side. But I wen grow up ova hea inside Jerusalem. I wen go school hea, an Gamaliel was my teacha. I learn all da stuff from our ancesta guys rules, an I wen go all out fo God jalike all you guys dat stay hea now.

4.verse: Da peopo dat stay tight wit dis Jesus Way, I wen make um suffa an wen kill um. I wen bus da guys an da wahines an wen throw um inside da jail.

5.verse: Da Head Priest guy an all da main leada guys, dey can tell you guys dat dis stay true. I even wen get lettas from dem fo da Jewish peopo Damascus side, dat say I get da right fo bring back Jesus guys to Jerusalem, fo throw um inside da jail an make um suffa. An I wen go ova dea fo do dat.

6.verse: Paul Tell Da Peopo He Wen Change - “Den wen almos noon time I wen come near Damascus, an right den an dea had one big light from da sky dat wen flash aroun me.

7.verse: I wen fall down on top da groun, an I hear one voice dat tell me, ‘Saul! Saul! How come you make me suffa?’

8.verse: I say, ‘Who you, Boss?’ He tell, ‘I Jesus from Nazaret, da guy you make suffa.’

9.verse: Da guys dat wen go wit me wen see da light, but dey neva hear da voice dat wen talk to me.

10.verse: I say, ‘Wat I gotta do, Boss?’ An da Boss tell me, ‘Stand up an go Damascus. Ova dea dey goin tell you all da stuff you gotta do.’

11.verse: My friends wen take my hand an wen lead me inside Damascus, cuz da light stay so bright I wen come blind an no can see notting.

12.verse: “One guy name Ananias wen come by me. He go all out fo do all da stuff Godʼs Rules say, an all da Jewish peopo ova dea get respeck fo him.

13.verse: He stand by my side, an say, ‘Brudda Saul, you can see now!’ An right den an dea I can see him.

14.verse: He say, ‘Our ancestas God wen pick you fo know wat he like do, an fo see Christ, da Guy Dat Stay Right, an fo hear wat he say.

15.verse: You goin be da one fo tell all da peopo wat you wen see an hear bout him.

16.verse: An now, wat you waiting fo? Stand up, go get baptize. An all da bad kine stuff you wen do, da Boss goin clean um up an throw um away, cuz you aks him fo help you.’

17.verse: Paul Gotta Tell Da Peopo Dat Not Jews - “I wen go back to Jerusalem, an I stay praying inside da temple. I wen see someting jalike one dream, an see da Boss talking.

18.verse: He tell me, ‘Hurry up! Go way from Jerusalem right now, cuz dey no goin like da stuff you say bout me!’

19.verse: I tell him, ‘Boss, dey know I wen go from one Jewish church to anodda fo throw da peopo dat stay trus you inside jail, an bus um up.

20.verse: An wen dey kill da guy Stephen dat wen talk fo you, I wen stand dea an tell um, “Dass good!” an I wen take care da clotheses fo da guys dat stay killing him.’

21.verse: But da Boss tell me, ‘Go. I goin send you far away by da diffren peopos dat not Jews.’ ”

22.verse: Da peopo wen listen to Paul till he say dat. Den dey wen start fo yell, “Kill um! Mo betta he no stay no moa!”

23.verse: Dey yell, an wave dea coats aroun, an throw da kine dust up in da air.

24.verse: Da main captain fo da Rome army guys wen tell his guys fo take Paul inside da army place. Da captain wen tell um fo whip him real hard, an fo make him talk so da captain can know how come da peopo wen yell at him lidat.

25.verse: Wen dey wen stretch him out fo whip him real hard, Paul wen tell da captain dat stay dea, “Dis okay in da rules fo da Rome peopo? fo you fo whip one guy dat get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo? even one guy dat neva do notting wrong?”

26.verse: Wen da captain hear dat, he wen go an tell da main captain, “Wat you goin do? Dis guy get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo!”

27.verse: Da main captain wen go by Paul an tell, “Eh, tell me, you get da same rights jalike one Rome guy, o wat?” Paul say, “Dass right.”

28.verse: Den da main captain wen say, “I wen pay plenny money fo get da same rights jalike one Rome guy.” Paul say, “But I wen born wit da same rights jalike one Rome guy.”

29.verse: Right den an dea da guys dat wen start fo make him talk wen go outside. Da main captain, he come scared wen he wen know dat he wen tie up Paul wit chains, an Paul one guy dat get da same rights jalike one Rome guy.

30.verse: Paul In Front Da Main Leadas - Da nex day da main captain wen like find out fo real kine, why da Jewish guys wen poin finga at Paul. He wen let him go outa jail, an tell da main priest guys an all da main leada guys fo come togedda. Den he wen bring Paul, an put him in front dem.

1.verse: Paul wen look strait at da main leada guys an say, “My bruddas, I know dat I wen do all da stuff God wen like me fo do wit good heart even till today.”

2.verse: Wen he say dat, Ananias da Head Priest guy wen tell da guys standing by Paul fo slap Paulʼs mout.

3.verse: Den Paul tell him, “God goin hit you. You jalike one wall dey wen cover wit white kine paint. You sit dea fo judge me jalike Godʼs Rules say, but den, you broke Godʼs Rules too, cuz you tell da guys fo slap me!”

4.verse: Da guys dat stand near Paul wen say, “Eh, you talking bad to Godʼs Head Priest guy!”

5.verse: Paul say, “Bruddas, I neva know he da Head Priest guy. Da Bible say, ‘No talk bad bout da leada fo yoa peopo.’ ”

6.verse: Den Paul wen figga dat some a dem was Sadducee guys an da oddas was Pharisee guys. So he wen yell inside dea, “My bruddas, I one Pharisee guy, an one Pharisee guyʼs boy. Dey stay bring me in front da main leadas cuz I stay waiting an I believe dat we goin come back alive from mahke.”

7.verse: Wen he say dat, da Pharisee guys an Sadducee guys ova dea wen start fo make argue, an dat wen make um split up.

8.verse: Cuz da Sadducee guys say dat nobody goin come back alive from mahke, an no mo angel guys, an no mo spirits. But da Pharisee guys believe all dat stuff.

9.verse: Dey wen make big noise, an den some a da Pharisee teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules wen stand up an wen make argue real hard. Dey say, “We no can find notting wrong wit dis guy. Maybe one spirit o one angel guy wen talk to him.”

10.verse: Dey wen make argue even mo hard, an da main captain wen tink dey goin broke up Paul. He wen tell his army guys fo go down, take Paul away from dem, an take him inside da army place.

11.verse: Da nex nite da Boss wen stand by Paul an say, “No scared! Be strong! Jalike you wen tell da peopo bout me inside Jerusalem, you goin tell um bout me inside Rome too.”

12.verse: Dey Try Kill Paul - Wen da sun wen come up, da Jewish guys wen come togedda an wen make plan bout Paul. Dey make promise dat dey no goin eat o drink notting till dey pau kill him.

13.verse: Mo den forty guys wen say dat.

14.verse: Dey wen go by da main priest guys an da older leadas an say, “We wen make one strong promise dat we no goin eat notting till we kill Paul.

15.verse: So you an da main leada guys go tell da main captain fo bring him in front you, an you ack jalike you like find out mo stuff bout wat he wen do. An we stay ready fo kill him befo he come ova hea.”

16.verse: But Paulʼs sistaʼs boy wen hear bout dat, an he wen go da army place, an tell Paul.

17.verse: Den Paul wen tell one a da captains fo come, an he tell him, “Take dis young guy by da main captain. He get someting fo tell him.”

18.verse: So den he wen take da young guy by da main captain, an say, “Paul, da prisona guy, he tell me fo bring dis young guy by you, cuz he like tell you someting.”

19.verse: Da main captain wen take da young guy by da hand, an wen take him by da side, an say, “Wat you like tell me?”

20.verse: He say, “Da Jewish guys wen make plan. Dey goin tell you fo bring Paul in front da main leada guys tomorrow. Dey goin ack jalike dey like find out mo stuff bout him.

21.verse: No do wat dey say, cuz mo den forty guys stay hiding an waiting fo um. Dey wen make one strong promise dat dey no goin eat o drink notting till dey pau kill um. Dey stay ready now. Dey waiting fo you fo do wat dey say.”

22.verse: Da main captain say, “No tell nobody dat you wen tell me dis.” An he wen let him go.

23.verse: Dey Send Paul By Felix, Da Governa - Den da main captain wen tell two a his captains fo come, an wen tell um, “Go get two hundred army guys ready, an seventy guys riding horses, an two hundred guys wit spears fo go Cesarea nine clock tonite.

24.verse: Go get horses fo da guy Paul, so dey can take him by Felix da Governa, an notting goin happen to him.”

25.verse: Den he wen write one letta dat say,

26.verse: “Yoa Honor, Governa Felix, dis me, Claudius Lysias, dat write you dis letta. I send you my aloha.

27.verse: Da Jewish guys wen grab dis guy Paul, an dey almos wen kill him, but I wen come wit my army guys fo take him outa dea. Cuz I find out dat he get da same rights jalike one Rome guy.

28.verse: An I wen like know how come dey poin finga at him, so I bring him in front da main Jewish leada guys.

29.verse: I wen find out dat he neva do notting wrong. Dey say he wen do stuff agains dea rules, but I neva find notting fo say he gotta mahke o go jail.

30.verse: Wen I know dat dey wen make plan fo kill him, right den an dea I wen send him by you. An I tell da guys dat poin finga at um fo come tell you bout um.”

31.verse: Da army guys wen do wat he wen say. Dey wen take Paul wit dem dat nite, an wen bring him Antipatris side.

32.verse: Da nex day dey wen let da guys on horses take him da rest a da way, an dey wen go back dea place.

33.verse: Wen da guys on horses wen come to Cesarea, dey wen give da letta to da governa, an give Paul to da governa too.

34.verse: Da governa wen read da letta, an wen aks him wea he come from. Wen he hear dat Paul stay come from Cilicia,

35.verse: he say, “I goin listen to you wen da guys come dat poin finga at you.” Den he wen tell da guys fo take Paul ova to Herodʼs palace an guard him ova dea.

1.verse: Da Jewish Guys Poin Finga At Paul - Afta five days da Head Priest guy Ananias wen go down to Cesarea wit some a da older leadas. Had one guy name Tertullus dat wen talk fo da Jewish guys. Dey wen poin finga at Paul in front Governa Felix.

2.verse: Den dey tell Paul fo come, an Tertullus wen tell Governa Felix, “Yoa Honor, long time you wen lead us an we stay good wit you. You wen do good stuff fo our peopo.

3.verse: We tank you everytime all ova da place fo all dis stuff.

4.verse: But now, so dat I no bodda you moa, try listen to us litto bit.

5.verse: We know dat dis guy stay making trouble. He stay make da Jewish peopo like beef all ova da world. He da leada fo da peopo dat stick wit Jesus from Nazaret.

6.verse: He even wen try make da temple pilau so no can pray dea. So we wen grab him. [We wen like bring him in front one judge jalike our Rules say,

7.verse: but da main captain name Lysias, he come an grab him from us.

8.verse: He wen tell us dat we gotta come in front you.] You can aks him yoaself, an you goin find out all da stuff we saying agains dis guy.”

9.verse: An da Jewish guys wen poin finga at Paul too, an say dat all da stuff Tertullus wen say, stay true.

10.verse: Paul Talk In Front Felix - Da governa wen tell Paul fo talk. An Paul wen say, “Yoa Honor, I know dat fo long time you stay judge fo da Israel peopo. So I stay good inside fo tell you da true stuff bout me.

11.verse: You can check all dis stuff out. Twelve days befo dis I wen go Jerusalem fo go down an pray to God dea.

12.verse: Da guys dat poin finga at me neva find me making argue wit nobody inside da temple. I neva make da peopo like beef inside da Jewish churches o odda place inside Jerusalem.

13.verse: Dey no can make proof da stuff dey say agains me.

14.verse: Dass true I go down an pray in front da God fo our ancesta guys. I stick wit da Jesus Way. But dese guys, dey say dass one fake way. I trus all da stuff Moses wen write down inside da Jewish Rules, an wat da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time wen write down too.

15.verse: I stay trus an wait fo God jalike dese guys. We trus dat da guys dat stay doing da right tings an da guys dat no do wass right, dey all goin come back alive from mahke.

16.verse: So, I everytime try fo do all da right stuff an make my heart stay good in front God an da peopo.

17.verse: “Long time I stay odda places, an den I wen come back to Jerusalem fo bring money fo my peopo, fo da poor peopo, an fo make sacrifice inside da temple.

18.verse: I wen make myself right fo go inside da temple, an dese guys wen find me ova dea inside da temple yard making lidat. Neva have plenny peopo dea, an I neva make trouble.

19.verse: But get some Jewish guys from Asia side ova dea. Dey neva even come ova hea fo tell you how come dey poin finga at me. If dey get someting agains me, let um come ova hea in front you an tell um.

20.verse: An da guys dat stay hea, let um say wat wrong ting dey tink I wen do. Dey neva tell dat wen I wen stand in front da main leadas.

21.verse: Da ony ting, wen I wen stand in front dem I wen say, ‘Dey poin finga at me today cuz I trus dat we all goin come back alive from mahke.’ I tink dass wat dey say agains me.”

22.verse: Felix da Governa, he wen know plenny stuff bout da Jesus Way. So he wen tell um dey can go home. He wen say, “Wen Lysias, da main captain, come, I goin take care dis stuff.”

23.verse: He tell da captain fo watch Paul, an no tie him up, an let his friends come take care him.

24.verse: Paul In Front Felix an Drusilla - Afta litto wile Governa Felix wen come wit his wife Drusilla. She one Jew. Felix tell da guards fo bring Paul, an Felix listen to him. Paul wen tell Felix bout how gotta trus Jesus Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

25.verse: Paul say dat we gotta get um right wit God, an do da right stuff, an we all goin stand in front God da Judge. Den Felix wen come scared, an he say, “Dass nuff fo now! You can go. Wen I like, I goin tell you fo come one mo time.”

26.verse: An he wen tink dat bumbye if he wait, Paul goin give um some money. So plenny times he wen tell Paul fo come an talk wit him.

27.verse: Two years lata, Porcius Festus wen take Governa Felix place, but Felix wen like do someting fo da Jewish peopo, so he wen leave Paul inside jail.

1.verse: Paul Like Talk To Cesar, Da Big King - Governa Festus wen come Cesarea side fo take charge, an three days lata he wen go from Cesarea to Jerusalem.

2.verse: Az wea da main priest guys an da Jewish leadas wen come in front him an wen poin finga Paul.

3.verse: Dey wen beg Festus fo do someting fo dem. Dey wen like him fo bring Paul to Jerusalem, cuz dey like kill him wen he stay coming.

4.verse: Festus tell um, “Paul stay one prisona inside Cesarea, an I going back dea pretty soon.

5.verse: Make some a yoa leada guys go wit me, an dey can poin finga at him ova dea, if he wen do someting wrong.”

6.verse: Festus wen stay ova dea eight o ten days, an den he wen go back Cesarea. Da nex day he wen sit down on top da judge chair, an wen tell um fo bring Paul in front him.

7.verse: Paul wen come, an da Jewish guys dat wen come from Jerusalem wen stand aroun Paul, an wen poin finga at him real hard. But dey no can prove notting.

8.verse: Paul wen say, “I neva do notting wrong agains da Jewish Rules o da temple o Cesar, da Big King.”

9.verse: Festus wen like do someting fo da Jewish guys, so he wen tell Paul, “You like go Jerusalem an stand in front me ova dea fo tell bout all dis stuff?”

10.verse: Paul say, “I goin stand in front King Cesar. Dass da right place. I neva do notting wrong fo da Jewish peopo. An you know dass true.

11.verse: If I wen do someting wrong so I gotta mahke, I goin take dat. But if da stuff dey say agains me no stay true, nobody get da right fo hand me ova to dem. I going in front King Cesar!”

12.verse: Festus wen talk to his guys, an den he say, “You wen aks fo go in front Cesar. Kay den. Dass wea you going!”

13.verse: Paul In Front King Agrippa An Queen Bernice - Bumbye King Agrippa an Queen Bernice wen come to Cesarea fo give dea aloha to Festus.

14.verse: Cuz dey goin stay ova dea long time, Festus wen tell King Agrippa bout Paul. He say, “Get one guy ova hea dat Governa Felix wen leave inside jail.

15.verse: Wen I wen go Jerusalem, da main priest guys an da older leadas fo da Jews wen poin finga at him, an say I gotta punish him.

16.verse: I wen tell um dat da Rome peopo no hand ova anybody befo he stand in front da judge, an den dey can poin finga at him an he can talk fo himself.

17.verse: Wen dey come ova hea by me, right den an dea I neva wait, but I wen sit on top da judge chair da nex day. An I wen tell um fo bring da prisona in front me.

18.verse: Wen da guys dat poin finga at him wen stand up fo talk, dey neva say notting I wen tink dey goin say.

19.verse: But dem guys believe one way an Paul believe one nodda way, an dey wen make argue bout dat, an bout one mahke guy name Jesus, dat Paul say he still stay alive.

20.verse: I neva know how fo check out all dat stuff, dass why I wen aks him if he like go Jerusalem an stand in front da judge ova dea.

21.verse: But Paul say he like go in front da Big King Cesar. So, I wen tell da army guys fo guard him till dat time come.”

22.verse: King Agrippa wen tell Governa Festus, “I like listen to dis guy.” Festus say, “Tomorrow you goin hear him.”

23.verse: Da nex day King Agrippa an Queen Bernice wen come all dress up an make big show. Dey wen go inside one big place wit all da main captains an da main leada guys fo da town. Festus tell da guys fo bring Paul inside, an dey wen bring him.

24.verse: Festus say, “King Agrippa, an all you guys dat stay hea wit us, hea da guy! All da Jewish peopo wen tell me bout him inside Jerusalem an ova hea inside Cesarea. Dey wen yell dat he gotta mahke right now.

25.verse: But I neva find notting he wen do dat he gotta mahke. But he wen aks fo go in front King Cesar, so I say he can go ova dea Rome side.

26.verse: But I no mo notting fo write down bout him in one letta fo send da Boss Cesar. Dass why I wen bring him in front all you guys, an even mo in front you, King Agrippa, so you can check him out, an den I can write down someting.

27.verse: Cuz I tink no stay good fo send one prisona ova dea if I no can say how come dey poin finga at um.”

1.verse: Paul Talk Fo Himself In Front King Agrippa - King Agrippa tell Paul, “You can talk fo yoaself.” An Paul wen wave his hand an say,

2.verse: “Yoa Honor King Agrippa, I tink dass good fo me fo stand in front you today fo talk fo myself agains all da stuff da Jews wen say agains me.

3.verse: I know dat you know all da ways da Jewish peopo do stuff, an all da stuff dey make argue bout. Dass why I beg you fo try listen to me till I pau talk.

4.verse: “All da Jewish peopo know how I wen make from small kid time, from my own country Tarsus side, an inside Jerusalem.

5.verse: Long time dey know me. I wen do all da stuff jalike one Pharisee guy. Dey can tell you, if dey like, dat I wen do even da small stuff an da hard stuff inside da Jewish Rules.

6.verse: An now I stay standing ova hea in front you cuz I trus an wait fo da stuff God wen promise our ancesta guys, az why.

7.verse: Dass da real stuff our twelve ohana stay waiting fo. Dey work fo God day an nite so dey can see um. Yoa Majesty, da Jewish guys stay poin finga at me cuz we trus an wait fo dis.

8.verse: God can make da mahke guys come alive again. How come you guys tink he no can?

9.verse: “Befo time, I wen tink dat I gotta do all da kine stuff fo stand up agains da guy name Jesus from Nazaret, jalike dem.

10.verse: An dass wat I wen do inside Jerusalem. Da main priest guys wen give me da power, an I wen throw plenny peopo dat stay spesho fo God inside jail. An I wen vote dat dey gotta mahke.

11.verse: Plenny times I wen go from one Jewish church to da odda fo punish um, an I wen try fo make um talk stink agains God. I wen come plenny huhu wit dem, an I even wen go da towns far away fo make um suffa.

12.verse: Paul Say Dat He Wen Change - “Dass why one time I stay going Damascus. Da main priest guys wen give me da power an wen tell me fo go afta da Christian peopo.

13.verse: Yoa Majesty, noon time I stay going on da road, an I wen spock one light from da sky. Da light stay mo bright den da sun. An wen flash all aroun me an my friends.

14.verse: We all wen fall down on top da groun, an I wen hear one voice dat wen talk in local talk, ‘Saul, Saul, why you make me suffa? You ony stay hurting yoaself.’

15.verse: Den I say, ‘Who you, Boss?’ An da Boss wen say, ‘I Jesus, da one you stay make suffa.

16.verse: Now stand on yoa feet. I wen come fo pick you fo work fo me an fo tell odda peopo wat you wen see an wat I goin show you.

17.verse: I goin take you away from yoa own peopo an from da guys dat not Jews, so dey no kill you. I goin send you

18.verse: fo open dea eyes an fo turn um away from da dark kine stuff to da light; fo turn um away from da Devilʼs power an turn um to God. Den I goin let um go, an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey do, an dey can come togedda wit all da peopo dat trus me an come spesho an good fo me.’

19.verse: Paul Tell Bout His Work - So den, King Agrippa, I wen do wat God wen show me.

20.verse: First I wen go by da peopo inside Damascus, an den inside Jerusalem an all ova Judea. An I wen tell da peopo dat not Jews too dat dey gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey do, an turn to God. An dey gotta show dat dey sorry fo real by da stuff dey do.

21.verse: Dass why da Jewish guys wen grab me inside da temple yard an wen try fo kill me.

22.verse: But God wen help me everytime till now. So I stand hea an tell da small peopo an da big peopo. I ony say da stuff da guys dat wen talk fo God an Moses wen say goin happen. I no say odda stuff.

23.verse: I tell um dat da Spesho Guy God Wen Send gotta suffa. An he da first Guy fo come back alive from mahke. An he goin tell his own peopo an da peopo dat not Jews bout Godʼs light.”

24.verse: Den Governa Festus wen butt in an wen yell, “Paul, you stay pupule! All da stuff you wen learn stay making you pupule!”

25.verse: Paul wen say, “Yoa Honor Festus, I not pupule. Wat I say stay true. You can undastan um.

26.verse: I know dat you, da king, know bout dis stuff, an I can talk strait to you. I know dat you know all bout dis stuff dat wen happen, cuz neva happen in one corner.

27.verse: King Agrippa, you trus wat da guys wen write down dat wen talk fo God? I know you trus um.”

28.verse: Den Agrippa wen tell Paul, “You tink dat in dis litto bit time you goin make me come one Christian?”

29.verse: Paul wen say, “Litto bit time o long time. I pray an aks God dat you an all da peopo dat stay listening to me now goin come jalike me -- but not tie up wit chains lidis.”

30.verse: Da king wen stand up, an da governa, an Queen Bernice, an da oddas sitting wit dem.

31.verse: Dey wen go outa da room, an wen tell each odda, “Dis guy neva do notting wrong dat say he gotta mahke o go jail.”

32.verse: An Agrippa wen tell Festus, “If dis guy neva aks fo stand in front da Big King Cesar, we wen let him go.”

1.verse: Paul Sail To Rome - Da leadas say we goin sail Italy side, an dey wen hand ova Paul an some odda prisona guys to one captain name Julius from Cesarʼs army guys.

2.verse: We wen go inside one boat from Adramytium dat stay ready fo sail da port towns on da Asia coast, an we wen go out on da ocean. Aristarkus from Macedonia, Tessalonika side, wen go wit us.

3.verse: Da nex day we wen come Sidon, an we wen go on top da land. Julius wen like do someting good fo Paul, an he wen let um go by his friends so dey can take care him.

4.verse: We wen go from ova dea out on da ocean again an wen pass near Cyprus Island on da leeward side, cuz da wind wen blow agains us.

5.verse: We wen sail da deep ocean by da Cilicia an Pamfylia coast, an wen come Myra, Lycia side, an wen go on top da land.

6.verse: Ova dea da captain wen find one boat from Alexandria dat stay going Italy side, an he wen put us on top um.

7.verse: Plenny days we wen go slow, an had hard time fo come by Knidus Island. Da wind neva let us go da way we like, so we wen sail by Crete Island, leeward side, unda Salmone Head.

8.verse: We wen get hard time wen we wen go by da coast side. An we wen come by one place dey wen call “Safe Harbor” near Lasea town.

9.verse: We wen lose plenny time, an da Spesho Day Fo Pray An No Eat wen come awready. Da ocean wen stay too rough fo sail dat time. So Paul wen tell um,

10.verse: “Eh, you guys. We betta not sail. I can see dat bumbye we goin get rough time. We goin lose da boat an all da stuffs, an all us too.”

11.verse: But da captain neva like listen to Paul. He wen do wat da pilot an da boat owna say.

12.verse: Dat port town no stay good fo da winta time, an almos all da guys wen tink mo betta fo go. Dey wen trus dat dey can come to Phoenix an stay ova dea winta time. Phoenix one port town Crete side dat face da soutwest an da nortwest.

13.verse: Da Storm On Da Ocean - One soft wind wen start fo blow from da sout, an dey tink dass da one dey need. So dey wen pull up da anchor an wen sail close by da Crete coast.

14.verse: afta litto wile one real strong wind wen blow on um from da island. Dat wind dey name “Da Norteast.”

15.verse: Da storm wen grab da boat, an dey no can handle da boat in da wind, so den we wen give up, an da wind wen blow us.

16.verse: Wen we wen pass by one small island name Cauda, on da leeward side, we almos no can bring da litto boat up.

17.verse: Da guys wen bring um up on top da big boat, an dey wen tie da ropes good aroun da big boat fo hold um togedda. Dey scared dat dey goin scrape on da sand by Syrtis inside Africa. Dey wen put out da sea anchor an wen let da boat go wit da wind.

18.verse: Da wind wen pound us real hard, an da nex day da guys wen start fo throw da stuffs ova inside da ocean.

19.verse: Day numba three, da guys even wen throw da tackle fo da boat inside da ocean.

20.verse: Plenny days da sun an da stars neva come out, an da storm still was going strong. An den we wen give up an tink we no goin come outa dis.

21.verse: Da guys neva eat plenny days, an den Paul wen stand up in front dem an say, “Eh, you guys, you neva like listen to me wen I say we betta not sail from Crete. If you guys wen listen, we neva get all dis trouble an lose all da stuffs.

22.verse: Now I beg you guys fo no give up, cuz you all goin come outa dis. We ony goin lose da boat.

23.verse: I stay tight wit God an work fo him, you know. Last nite one angel messenja guy from God wen stand by me.

24.verse: He say, ‘No scared, Paul. You gotta stand in front da Big King Cesar. God doing plenny good kine stuff fo you, an now he goin let all da guys dat sail wit you come outa dis okay. Dey no goin mahke.’

25.verse: You guys, try no give up. Cuz I trus God dat he goin do jalike wat he wen tell me.

26.verse: But da boat goin get bus up on one island.”

27.verse: Nite numba fourteen, da wind still wen blow us across da Adriatic Ocean. Bout midnite da sailor guys wen tink dey coming near one land.

28.verse: Dey wen drop one line an wen find out dat da water stay one hundred an twenty feet deep. Afta litto wile dey wen find out dat da water stay ninety feet deep.

29.verse: Dey wen come scared dat da wind goin pound us agains da rocks, an dey wen put down four anchors from da stern an wen pray dat da day time can come fast.

30.verse: Da sailor guys wen try fo escape from da boat, an wen put da litto boat down inside da ocean. Dey wen ack like dey putting down da anchors from da front a da big boat.

31.verse: Den Paul wen tell da captain an da army guys, “If dese guys no stay by da boat, you no goin come outa dis.”

32.verse: So da army guys wen cut da ropes fo da litto boat an wen let da litto boat go.

33.verse: Jus befo da sun wen come up, Paul wen beg da guys fo eat. He say, “Fourteen days you guys wen wait, an you neva eat notting.

34.verse: Now I beg you guys fo eat someting. You need um fo stay alive. You guys no goin lose even one hair from yoa head.”

35.verse: Wen he wen say dat, he wen take some bread an wen tank God in front all dem. Den he wen broke um an wen start fo eat.

36.verse: Dat wen kokua dem, an dey all wen eat.

37.verse: (Had two hundred seventy-six guys on top da boat.)

38.verse: Wen dey wen eat all da stuff dey wen like, dey wen throw da grain inside da ocean an wen make da boat mo light.

39.verse: Da Boat Bus Up - Wen da sun wen come up, dey neva know da land wea dey was. But dey wen spock one bay an one sandy beach. Dey wen tink stay mo betta fo make da boat eat it ova dea.

40.verse: Dey wen cut da ropes fo da anchors an wen leave um inside da ocean. Same time dey wen hemo da ropes from da ruddas. Den dey wen raise all da sails in front to da wind an wen steer um to da beach.

41.verse: But da boat wen hit one side current. Da front wen come stuck an no can move. Da back wen come all bus up cuz da surf wen pound um.

42.verse: Da army guys wen like kill da prisona guys so dat dey no can swim away an escape.

43.verse: But da captain wen like take Paul outa dea alive, so he neva let um. He wen tell da guys dat can swim fo jump ova inside da ocean first an swim to da land.

44.verse: He wen tell da odda guys fo hang on da boards o da pieces from da boat. Dass how all da guys wen come to da land, an nobody wen mahke.

1.verse: Malta Side - We wen come to da land okay, an we find out dat dey name da island Malta.

2.verse: Da local peopo wen show us plenny aloha. Dey wen make one fire an tell us fo come cuz stay raining an cold.

3.verse: Paul wen bring some wood fo da fire. Wen he put um on top da fire, one snake wen come outside da wood, cuz stay hot. Da snake wen grab Paulʼs hand.

4.verse: Wen da local peopo wen spock da snake hanging from Paulʼs hand, dey wen tell each odda, “Eh, fo shua dis guy wen kill somebody. He wen get outa da ocean okay, but da gods no goin let um stay alive.”

5.verse: But Paul wen shake da snake from his hand inside da fire, an notting wen happen to Paul.

6.verse: Da peopo wen tink he goin swell up o mahke fast. Dey wen wait plenny, an dey neva see notting funny kine happen. So dey wen change dea mind an say, “Eh! Must be he one god!”

7.verse: Had one big place near dea fo da governa fo da island, his name Publius. He wen show us aloha an tell us fo come inside his house. We wen stay dea fo three days, an he wen take care us real good.

8.verse: His fadda stay sick in bed. He get one feva an da runs. Paul wen go by him an pray an put his hands on top um, an he wen make um come good.

9.verse: Afta dat, da peopo wen bring all da odda sick peopo on da island, an Paul wen make um come good.

10.verse: Dey wen give us plenny stuffs, cuz dey get respeck fo us. Wen we was ready fo sail, dey wen give us all da stuffs we wen need.

11.verse: From Malta To Rome - Afta three months we wen sail on top one boat dat wen stay by Malta Island all winta. Da boat wen come from Alexandria an had da twin gods Castor an Pollux on da front.

12.verse: We wen come to Syracuse an stay ova dea three days.

13.verse: We wen sail from dea an wen come Regium. Da nex day da sout wind wen come, an da nex day we wen come Puteoli.

14.verse: Ova dea we wen meet some bruddas. Dey wen tell us fo come stay dea house fo one week. An den we wen go way from dea fo go Rome.

15.verse: Da bruddas ova dea wen hear dat we stay coming, an dey wen come to da Appius Market an da Three Taverns fo meet us. Wen Paul wen spock dem, dat wen kokua him, an he wen tank God.

16.verse: Inside Rome - We wen go inside Rome, an dey wen let Paul stay inside one place by himself, an one army guy wen guard um.

17.verse: Afta three days Paul wen tell da leadas fo da Jewish peopo fo come. Wen dey wen come, Paul wen tell um, “My bruddas, I neva do notting agains our peopo o agains our ancesta guys ways. But dey wen bus me inside Jerusalem an hand me ova to da Rome guys.

18.verse: Da Rome guys wen aks me plenny stuffs, an dey wen like let me go, cuz I neva do notting dat say I gotta mahke.

19.verse: But da Jewish guys neva like dem fo let me go, so den, I wen say I gotta come in front da Big King Cesar. But I no mo notting fo poin finga at my peopo.

20.verse: So I wen tell dese guys I like talk to you. I trus God dat he goin take da Israel peopo outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in. Dass why dey wen tie me up wit dis chain.”

21.verse: Da Jewish guys wen say, “We neva get no lettas from Judea bout you. An da bruddas dat wen come from ova dea neva say notting stink bout you.

22.verse: But we like listen to wat you say. We know dat da peopo all ova da place stay talking agains dis stuff you teach.”

23.verse: Den dey wen say dey goin come togedda one spesho day. An dat time even mo peopo wen come to da place wea Paul stay. Wen da sun come up till da sun go down he wen tell um all da stuff bout how dey can get God fo dea King. He wen try help um fo trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. He start wit da stuff Moses wen write down inside da Rules, an den he talk bout da odda guys dat wen talk fo God befo time.

24.verse: Some guys wen trus da Good Stuff Paul wen tell um, but da odda guys neva like trus um.

25.verse: Dey wen go way an make argue wit each odda. But first Paul wen say, “Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen tell yoa ancesta guys da trut! Isaiah wen talk fo him

26.verse: an say, ‘God wen tell me fo go by dis peopo an say, “You guys goin hear, But you no goin undastan. You guys goin see, But you no goin see fo real.

27.verse: Cuz dis peopo hard head, Dea ears no can hear good. Dey close dea eyes, Cuz dey no like see fo real. Dea ears no like hear fo real. Inside dey no like undastan fo real. Dey no like change so I can make um come good.” ’ Dass wat Isaiah wen say.”

28.verse: Paul say, “I like you guys know dat God send his guys by da peopo dat not Jews, so he can take dem outa da bad kine stuff dey do. An dey goin listen!”

29.verse: [So da Jewish guys wen go way an wen make argue real hard wit each odda.]

30.verse: Fo two years Paul wen stay ova dea inside one house he wen rent. He wen show aloha fo all da peopo dat wen come by him.

31.verse: He wen teach um how dey can get God fo dea King an all bout da Boss Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He not scared fo tell um, an nobody wen try make him shut up.
